column3: Jesu e nâŋâcnere erâ juju-ticne qikiŋnewecko maŋjauŋte fuŋne šâŋitambeŋ . Eme nâŋâc iŋuc jaha âgofâc-nâŋec jaŋere erâ juju-nâŋec qikiŋnenaŋte munârekicne .

Aakic hombaŋ maickehame Jesuzi e jahacnere šiŋuc manawec : No mâreŋ beherâ Mamactao risie fepemurâ dameŋ bembeŋkekac . Iŋuc manarâ mâreŋko wiacfâc-ticne maŋjauŋ ejarewec , i ejare tarahuc hâmoocte muwec .
Me weni jaŋere Anutuzi maname gâpâreme jara 40 tarawec ? I sâqocne bahuc mâreŋ tuhuo hâmo sipiric embiŋ jaŋere hâcne iŋuc ewec .
Anuture mume rereŋfâc ŋoŋe mârâc jaha qâpuc-ŋeŋicko sasechec jujumbieŋ , ju ju sâc ijaha šiŋuczia mi junšepieŋ .
Anutu e ŋic sasawa bâturec-jopahuc qaqatarao basanaŋ-jopawec , i mâmâc sasawa buuruc-ticnao ŋec-jopaocte iŋuc ewec .
Eme no wiac jujune jaŋere ŋondeŋko ŋicmarac tinac fuarâ šiŋuc mume manapo : “ Padi tase 2 furine 1 kina â jacgoŋ 12 iŋuc jaha furine 1 kina . Erâ saŋ hâmeŋ fâric ine akicketec fuazejec . ”
Wofuŋte maio maŋhuhuŋ jupie eki bafaharec-ŋopaocmu .

E dameŋ bawec fokac , ira mâreŋne mâreŋne ŋic fuŋne-nâŋec bataniŋkerâ okacne sâckoa nâreocmu . Erâ ŋic moc e gie i hâcne baocte âkendâŋnewec , erâ mâreŋŋic sasawa e manapaŋkenaŋte hâmockonec bâɋârewec jukac . ”
Qarâ muc šârâneheczi hendiŋ ba akic erâ qizecnao hecnepie huwec â ŋaqi bâbâroŋ mâmâc hecnepie huwec .

Irec no šiŋuc mukopac : Hozec sahac ɋâri jaŋe ŋic mocwâc rorâ naru motec rocjoparâ dete mamac â ro rikec qâ rikec enšepieŋ . Iŋuc ehuc jupie kisâ jaŋe sâqocnere ojowa baniŋmurâ dâŋ basarâ behenšepieŋ .
Mamaczi no maŋnuekac â noni Mamac maŋkeekopac , dâŋ i manapie fârine ezejec . Me miczi mupe mi sâcŋopakacko wiac bapa-nanere erâ dâŋ i mana šakieniŋ .
Eme hâmoc â hârâc i šocriqicko behepie huwec . Izi hâmoc namba tu ekac , šocriqic hâcne .
Kristo e iŋucnere sâc erâ muzac mâreŋ fuaweckonecteaŋ wemo afecne hâmo warehuc juzac . E ine iŋuc mi ehuc dameŋ ŋondeŋ tataranao due-nâŋec bahuc kiŋnâŋec bârârieocte fua tâcnewec .
mâreŋ burocnao gume qataŋ ejarehuc juhame jara 40 ewec .
Âgofâc-nane , ŋoŋe tiwâ wirec nâniŋte tumaŋnerâ woŋec ŋehapie fisi-fârepie fuŋkenšepieŋ .
Eme wiac šiŋuc honepo : Lama e sâfâ namba 6 bâhockeme homeŋ sâko bawec . Ehame šoaŋ gâpârerâ kuši sahacne iŋucne ewec , â mosa e soc iŋucne ewec .
Ŋokac gâcne jaŋere ŋokâ hâmockonec bâɋâre-jarekicne . Ŋic tucne bâšâic-jopahuc mâsi qâsi ejarekicne , eme “ miti behepie akic-ŋopazo ” jazapie , juju sanaŋte ɋâreniŋte manasuhuc qikiŋnembiŋ .

Mume Paulozi šiŋuc âzâcnewec : “ Jaŋe Romaŋic guruonec fuakicne nâhe dâŋficko mi râec-nâfohuc ŋichofao qâtâc bâtâc-nâforâ kâpâcwâru ficko râec-nâfombieŋ . Eme ši wemocte kamicnea sorec-nâfoŋgopieŋ ? Iŋuc aricne , jaŋac ware jowac-nâfopie razeperec . ”

Sâcmutâc dâŋ šiŋuc mukicne : Ŋowe ŋonâŋ ŋohe bebehec mi ezepirec , go šika mi qazemec , go fiuc mi rozemec , go andac mi ezemec , sâcmutâc dâŋ i erâ gâcne i mâmâc sasawa qâhâckerâ qizecne šiŋuc mukicne : Gahacnere egareekac sâc ijaha âgogere egarezejec .
Eme moc e irec erâ worickehuc juocmuzi Wofuŋ e ɋaɋacne jukac iŋucnea juocte maŋticne emasaŋkeocmu .
No maŋwâmbuŋ-nanezi Anutu sâcmutâc dâŋticnere mana aŋac eekopac .
Ŋoŋe Wofuŋte erâ šeri bubiaŋ manahuc junšepieŋ , no harierâ mupe , šeri bubiaŋ mananšepieŋ .
Eme no ŋic dâŋ nazawec e honepemurâ fotikiepo . Fotikierâ lambe 7 golzi bakicne honepo .
Erâ weni jaŋere mumupaŋ dâŋ šiŋuc muwec : Nore jujumana hae mâreŋko mi rašinšepieŋ ? I dâŋticne qahuc jumbiŋ jaŋere hâcne muwec .
No mi fuahape fuambiŋ jaŋe ine fiuc roro â soroŋ qaqa . Irec lama jaŋe dâŋjeŋic mi manambiŋ .
Kiŋaŋ qaqa ŋoŋe bomboŋfâc-ŋeŋic araŋ bajarehuc micjeŋic reŋkenšepieŋ , i bomboŋ urucne â mâteŋne jaŋe sawa mâcne , šâšâicne jaŋe mâmâc iŋuc ejarenšepieŋ .
Ehuc dâŋ qanaŋ bâmockerâ âgofâc-jeŋic jarepie bajumbiŋ jaŋe ejarepie Stefanore burec ehuc šiŋuc mumbiŋ : “ Ŋic e tiri ufuŋ â sâcmutâc dâŋnâŋec surehuc juekac .
Wiac i Anuture mâsi sasawa . Eki hâcne Kristozi jahacnehec miriŋ bacnâpowec . Erâ nâŋâc miriŋ babac biŋedâŋ mupene haŋ baocte irec gie munârewec .
Âgofâc-nane , porofete Wofuŋte micte dâŋ mumbiŋzi šâic busâqoc tatakic tâmiric manahuc jumbiŋ jaŋere kike hata bâjâpehuc junšepieŋ .
Eme ira Wofuŋte šâŋe riwaseckeniŋmu , jaŋe sisipirickonec batarac-jopazo . '
“ Jâmbomac ¡ Mumuteŋ â eri qaraweŋ â maŋɋârâŋ â daŋge mumu â šâŋe rara â tâpiri â sasanaŋ i Anutu-nâŋec focnekaczi focne rahuc juzejec sanaŋ . Jâmbomac . ”
Ŋoŋe sahacte eri , qizec ba ericko bapa , kubu wiac furi sâko qoqonaŋ , ŋaqi qâreŋ biaŋ rojuju , irec manapie jawane ezejec .

Irec go Wofuŋ-nâŋecte biŋe mutaniŋkecmurâ mimi gaŋgaŋ mi ezemec , erâ kâpâcwâru ŋicticne nore dâŋ mucmurâ acmeruŋ wâc mi ezemec . Go Anutuzi tâpiri gareme sâc no qâsuecnurâ Biŋebiaŋte erâ šârâ hâriŋ faio juzemec .
Jaŋe dâŋ fâri qizecnezi maŋjeŋic furu bame juniŋte no nahac wâc jaŋere erâ maŋsahac-nane bâtirirâ râekopac .
Irec go ɋârerâ ŋic gâcne hâmozo eŋgopieŋ jaŋe maŋjeŋic âke ɋârezemec . Manakic , no Anuture maio eebapage honepe mi sâckekac .
Eme aŋelo namba 3 eki râqâc-ticnaonec wiac hoŋkeme opâo â riqicko hume soc efârewec .
Jesu ekizia motâc ronârewecte akio juŋgopeneŋ wâc . Erâ juku Anuture huriri qâreŋ fua tâcneme hone šiziwenaŋmu irec mamanac juhuc mu šeri eeŋgopeneŋ .
Ŋoŋe šiŋuc mana sanaŋkenšepieŋ : Boe sau ŋic â sasec mamakâchec â buchâro , nemu qaŋgec ŋic hâcne , jaŋe Kristo â Anutu uucmaŋ-ticnao ŋeŋe basaniŋmu .
Abraham e mamanasiŋhec juwecte mâreŋ-ticne beherâ moc rauckeocte irec dâŋ erao fuame reŋkewec . Erâ mâreŋ irec me irec mukicne kâuc bahuc sifu rawec .
Waiŋ opâ wiacte âmbâŋ mi enšepieŋ , izi maŋ sisipiric gie . Mârore ine âmbâŋ enšepieŋ .
Ŋic i jaŋe sasec gie bapie bocjahazi honerâ bâjâpec-jopaniŋmu , eme jaŋere erâ miti hata susure fuaocmu .
Erâ wâc hata bâšâwe-nârewecte nâŋâc Mâro mocjaha rauckerâ Mamactao fisieŋgopeneŋ .
Á qâpuckonec opâ ruac jaŋe nemuɋâŋte taha bâzi , qowisoc , qowi bituakicne â sasec boe sau irec sawa bâec baniŋte mupaŋke-jarembeŋ . ”
Râeme Petorozi šiŋuc âzâcnewec : “ Anania , go wemocte Sataŋzi maŋge bâsifuckeme Tiri Mâro eatuckehuc hae mâreŋgere furi tucne hefackekomec ?
Nâŋâc ɋiene hati mi ee sanaŋkerâ juhapene eeatuc ŋic jaŋe sioc enârepie gibioc dâŋ â mumusifuc-jeŋicte mâŋâŋzi ba bâsoriŋ â qac qârândiŋ moc mi enârezejec .

Sâqocne bapazi Anuture uucmaŋko rarašine mi fokac , i mi manaŋgopieŋ me ? Ŋoŋe maŋŋeŋic mi eatuckeniŋ , sau bapa , me  bawe qaŋgec babaju , me ŋokac ba behecne , me sasecŋic , me ŋiczia mamakâc eec eene ,
Ehuc mitire tutumaŋko gâcnezi mi fisihuc qâoma eeŋgopieŋ iŋuc mi ezo . Dameŋ sâko bâqiŋ-nâpokac , iŋuc hâcne manahuc šoɋac erâ faŋ qaqac enšepeneŋ .
Wiac kecšiŋucte ine sowa juhuc sahac-ŋeŋic bâhâmonšepieŋ : Boe sau , maŋwânâŋ , bu gâgâpâcne , sasec sâqocne , buchâro , i eocmu e sahac-ticnezi wofuŋ ecnekac muzo .
Ʒoaŋte biŋe ekicne nâŋâc ine maŋte sowa junšepeneŋ , ehuc mamanasiŋ â maŋjauŋ izi maruku enârezejec , â bâbâpiaŋte woworiczi dunâŋec ezejec .
Ehuc šiŋuc manasuzemec : Anutu e hâbi-nâŋec goroŋkeocte mâro mi nârewec , tâpirihec â maŋ jauŋhec â maŋsowahec enaŋte nârewec .
Á ŋic moc e sâcmutâc dâŋticne mana rereŋ mi ehuc muocmu , “ No Anutu mana maŋ eekopac ” , ere burecŋic muzo , ŋic iŋucnere maŋko dâŋ fâri qizecne mi fokac .
bubiaŋ-nane ferâ foocte mamanasu-ŋeŋic qâturenšepieŋ , erâ maŋzi šâšâfic ehuc mocjaha efârerâ wiac irecteaŋ henširiŋnehuc junšepieŋ .
Iŋuc mume kâpâcwâru baniŋte mumbiŋ . Erâ dameŋ-ticne mi maickewecte mejeŋic mâckeme behembiŋ .
Erâ mu jaretec buafec â bokifac erâ eehâmo gie bahuc mitire fârine bocjaha bâfuanšepieŋ .
Eme jaŋe mumbiŋ , “ E sâqocne bapa mi juzac muzac gorao mi bawarenšapeŋ . ”

Ʒoaŋ gie bapa wose bâtâc eekaczi Wofuŋte erâ eekac , â nânâ kosa nâekaczi Wofuŋte erâ eekac wâc , ehuc Anutu nânâre daŋge âzâcneekac . Á nâ bâtâc eekaczi iŋuc jaha Wofuŋte erâ eekac , ehuc Anutu daŋge âzâcneekac wâc .
Sambaŋ worickehuc bubiaŋ junšepieŋ , â šâic busâqocko maŋuruc junšepieŋ . Erâ nunumu gie i uruc šuhuc jaha banšepieŋ .
Iŋuc murâ momori micne šiŋuc âzâcnewec : “ Ŋoŋe Paulo soŋaŋkehuc râsi šâŋe mi ecnenšepieŋ , â âgofâcne fisirâ jauŋ bazo mupie mi qatara-jarenšepieŋ . ”
maŋjauŋhec e dede ââsic-ticne ɋârâŋne , mamanasiŋ-ticne ɋârâŋne , maŋzi woworic-ticne ɋârâŋne , maŋuruc-ticne ɋârâŋne .
Dâŋqâreŋ moc šiŋuc fokac : “ No Wofuŋ manasiŋkeekopacte miti muekopac . ” Eme nâŋe dâŋqâreŋ irec sâcko Mârozi esoc-nâpoha Wofuŋ manasiŋkeeŋgopeneŋte miti mueŋgopeneŋ .

Âgofâc , hazec qâuŋ dâŋ moc ŋazape mananiŋ . Ŋic kosa jujune jaŋe uŋ sawaŋ ejarenšepieŋ , ŋic manabâcne jaŋe mu âkeriŋ ejarenšepieŋ , betaŋkekicne jaŋe dopec-jopanšepieŋ , erâ mâmâc hezu hemiriŋ ejarenšepieŋ .
Eme aŋelo namba 5 eki râqâc-ticnaonec wiac qowi mimicnere ŋicwofuŋ ŋeŋeo hoŋkeme wahawec . Wahame hae mâreŋ-ticne dapâc efârewec . Eme ŋic jaŋe šâic serereŋ manahuc nameŋ-jeŋic kitâcnembiŋ .
Gaŋ rukec ira hâcne domaeŋgopieŋ sâc ŋoŋerao wama â buuruc fotâcnerâ fozejec , erâ Anuture Israe ŋic jaŋerao mâmâc .
Erâ Wofuŋte miti hata qazucnepie i mâmâc manawec . Miti Opâ i Johanere Miti Opâ sawa manaweczi sifu Jesure binaŋ šocmâsâc bâruŋhec ninic jaha ŋic jaza qazuc ewec .
Irec ŋoŋe nânâ qowi nâniŋte , me i me i eniŋte Anutu mumbiaŋkehuc enšepieŋ .

Ŋoŋere ine šiŋuc mukopac , Mâro rua-ŋarewec i ŋoŋerao foocmu , irec wemocte ŋic moczi mu qazuc eŋareocmu , i aricne . Mâro ruambiŋ eki dâŋ sasawa ŋaza qazuc eekac . Eme dâŋ i burec mâcne , i jâmbomac . Eme qazu-ŋarewec iŋuc maŋnao junšepieŋ .
Irec šiŋuc fokac : Sahac e mâro tâmiric erâ qâŋɋâŋ eekac , iŋuc jaha mamanasiŋzi eehâmo gie tâmiric qâŋɋâŋne jaha eekac .
Iŋuc murâ hone-fârehapie poroŋ moc rorâ Anutu daŋge âzâcnehuc bazurâ nâwec .
Jaŋe nemuɋâŋte wiac mamakâcne â sasec boe sau â qowi bituakicne â qowisoc , wiac i bâec baniŋte mupaŋkerâ papia qâreŋke-jarenšepeneŋ .
Mume Paulozi šiŋuc âzâcnewec : “ Maŋge tâŋzi qakicne go Anutuzi guocmu . Go sâcmutâc dâŋte sâcko norao mumutiŋ gie bazo mukiczi wemocte sâcmutâc dâŋ qâsuahuc nuniŋte jazakic ? ”
Eme Jesu Kristohec jueŋgopieŋ ŋic i jaŋerao sâqocnere okacne mumutara-jare moc mi fufuane .
I šiŋucte : Anutu e kimbeŋ-ticnere fârine hotâckenaŋte mâcne , Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristore erâ bâbâpiaŋ rauckenaŋte muekac .
Wefurâ ŋicne ŋicne mâreŋ ŋifec â ŋifec , faic â juwic juŋgopieŋ maŋjeŋic bâsifuckerâ Gogo â Magogo ŋic qafeŋ-jopame râsi roroc erâ fisiniŋmu , jaŋe šare-jeŋic hâwec moŋgeŋ iŋucne , wowosene tâmiric .

Eme gâcne ŋoŋe mârâc sâc iŋuc hâcne jujumbieŋ ši ine šurec-ŋopakicne â maŋfuru bacŋopakicne â kiŋfâsâc bacŋopakicne . I Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristore šâŋe bajueŋgopieŋte â Anutu-nâŋecte Mârohec jueŋgopieŋte iŋuc eŋarekicne .

No irec hâcne šârâ hâriŋ faio juekopac , ehuc mi mimieekopac . No manasiŋkeekopac ere maŋjahec mi eekopac , aricne , no šiŋuc manapaŋkeekopac , e tâpiriheczi šeŋaŋ-nane sâcne soŋaŋke-narehame dameŋ sâko maickezokac .
Ŋoŋe šâfo sâc Mârore tâpirio Wofuŋ šušuhuc jaha numucnehuc wâsickenšepieŋ , erâ qâoma mi ehuc rucjaric-ŋeŋic banšepieŋ , erâ hae sâc mitiŋic guru jaŋere nunumu gie banšepieŋ wâc .
Paulo , Siliwano â Timoteo nâŋe Tesalonike haeonec kikefuŋ , Anutu Mamac â Wofuŋ Jesu Kristo ere ŋicfâc , ŋoŋere papia ši râeŋgopeneŋ . Aki anonoc â wama ŋoŋerao fotâcnerâ fozejec .
Wofuŋzi bâqiŋ-nâpokacte ŋic sasawa wamane ejarenšepieŋ .
Ŋoŋe poroŋ â waiŋ i nâniŋmu sâc Wofuŋ hâmoc biŋe-ticne mutaniŋkehuc juhapie risieocmu .
Eme mamanasiŋko nunumu mukicne izi huchec bâpiaŋkeocmu â Wofuŋzi e ɋiɋicne baocmu . Á sâqocne bawecko i bâtâmirecneocmu .
Mamac ŋosafâc-nane jaŋe maŋfâsâc juhuc tuczi tuc Anuture kiŋaŋ qawarekupie ɋâric-jeŋic noni iŋuc jaha eekopaczi daŋge âzâcnehuc nunumuo šušuhuc ŋafe furec manasucguhuc juekopac .
“ Waharâ ŋemac-nâporâ bârârâŋ-nâpopie eri ŋeŋeo ŋekac ere šâŋeo mi henšepeneŋ â Lamare kimbeŋ mi honenšepeneŋ .
Mârozi kikefuŋ dâŋ jazakac , i hazecneheczi manazejec . Moc e sasanaŋ gie baraku batarame e mana soŋne gumepemu . Erâ qânâ qaŋqaŋ râcnepemu , ira šâŋe qâreŋ-ticne moc fome runezia buc manaocmu . '
Erâ wâc moneŋ mafare andac ehuc maŋko fuac dâŋzi eatuc-ŋopahuc wiac-ŋeŋicte kâŋgâc gie baniŋmu . Jaŋere okacne dâŋ esecne mukicne i mi pârâwewec , â sisipiric-jeŋic i micmâŋ mi ewec .
Ŋic jaŋe iŋuc eeŋgopieŋte Anutuzi eeatuc neŋgoc qizecne sâko mume fuame burecko qohotaniŋmu hâcne .
Irec hâcne kecšiŋuc qâreŋkekicne : “ Qâpuc jaŋe ŋoŋere kiŋte erâ Anuture šâŋe musoriŋkeeŋgopieŋ . ”
Mârâc jaha Jaŋe â Jambere jahe Mosere dâŋ bawahapic , iŋuc jaha ŋic mukopac jaŋe maŋjeŋic sifuckekicnere mamanasiŋte hata kâuc bahuc mutuc eeŋgopieŋ .
No âgo bacjopaekopac jaŋe mu bâtiŋ â qa bâtiŋ ejare-fâreekopac . Irec go šoɋac erâ maŋge bârisiezemec .
Nâŋâc mamanasiŋte erâ kiŋfâsâc embeŋte Jesu Kristorao qohotahuc Anuture wamao juŋgopeneŋ .

Gahacne maŋ sahac soŋaŋkehuc mitire dâŋfuŋne furu mimic foŋareocte mâmâc soŋaŋkezemec . Go i hâcne paŋšâic bajuzemec . Iŋuc ecmuo ine dâŋge manaeŋgopieŋ jaŋe mecne â go gahacne mâmâc juju biaŋko fisiniŋmu .
Judaŋic jaŋere mitificne ficne opâ ruac jopahuc jaŋe Jesure šâŋe musoriŋkeniŋte wiac qacne gâpâcne ejare jupac . Erâ no momori wânšâŋ erâ hae šoricko ra jopa jâpec ejare jupac wâc .
Maŋraŋɋare gie i soŋsoŋko mi foekac , i šiŋuc fuaekac : Boe sau , mamakâc , nâ areŋ ,
Irec he sarac eekac ere mi muzo , â hofâ gie baekac ere mi muzo , jambuŋkeme fârine fuaekac , Anutu hâcne ere mocjaha muzo .
Eme mitire wiac moc mi basaeŋgopieŋ . Mâc Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo fua taniŋkeocte woŋec mocjaha jueŋgopeneŋ .
Eme sambâŋkonec dâŋfânâŋ manapo , i opâ sâro fânâŋ iŋucne â ɋuŋ fânâŋ sâko iŋucne . Erâ dâŋfânâŋ i manape musi tinac ewec , ŋic bocjaha musi bapie fânâŋkeekac iŋuc tinac manapo .
Eme e manasiŋkeniŋmu jaŋe šâŋe biŋe-ticnere erâ sâqocne tâmire-jareocmu , i porofete jaŋe mufua-fârembiŋ . ”
Ŋic eehâmo gie paŋšâic bahuc eri tatamac â juju saric bâfuaniŋte samarieniŋmu jaŋe juju sanaŋ jarezokac .
Johane no Asia mâreŋko kikefuŋ 7 juŋgopieŋ ŋoŋere papia ši qâreŋkekopac . Juweczi jukac erâ wâc wareocmu eraonec mecne , â mâro 7 eri ŋeŋefuŋ-ticnao juŋgopieŋ jaŋeraonec mecne ,

Wiac i Jesuzi biŋe qanârewec , juju sanaŋ hâcne .

Anutu e mârâc jaha fuŋnao dapâc fohame hae mâreŋ fureocte mume furewec , ekizia hâcne mume maŋnâŋecko mitire tatamaczi uŋ heme Kristore šâŋe maio Anuture huriri qâreŋ fua tâcneha šâŋitambeŋ .
Ehame Efeso haeo Judaŋic moc fisiwec , šâŋene Apolo . E Alesandria haeo fuawec , ŋic e mamana sâkohec , miti papia woseku mana tara-fârewec .

Go paŋšâic erâ dâŋ i hâcne jazahuc mu sawaŋ â mu bâtiŋ ejarezemec . Ŋic jaŋe go mi hucgunšepieŋ .

Iŋuc mume kâpâcwâru bazo ehuc bârucnepie rawec .

Mamanasiŋhecte mâreŋ biŋe qacnekicne ira ra fisirâ jaba juwec . Jaba juhuc bozeo sawa ŋeŋerâ juwec . Isaka â Jakobo jahe biŋe mâmâc qajactekicnezi sâc ijaha epic .

Eme irec weniŋuc muzo ? Anutu erao guriŋ bapa hehesicne moc fokac me ? I aric kereŋne .

Ŋic mocjahazi soŋaŋ moc dâŋko râezo mume mi manacnezemec , ŋic 2 me 3 jaŋe mupie ine manarâ giene bazemec .
Ŋaŋac wâc mitio meo babac enšepieŋ . Hae sâc Kristore kikefuŋ jaŋe ŋoŋere mamanac wâc juŋgopieŋ .

Erâ šira iŋuc jaha šâŋege riwaseckeeŋgopeneŋ nâŋe repac-nâporâ bacnâpo raocte taha bapa micne jaŋe mucnembiŋ . ”

Israe ŋic jaŋerao porofete burecne i wâc mâmâc fuarâ jumbiŋ , eme ŋoŋerao iŋuc jaha qaqazu burecne fuaniŋmu . Jaŋe mitire mumusifuc bâfuapie ŋoŋerao fâfâuc fuaocmu , erâ Wofuŋ kiwiric-jeŋic rowec e mickeniŋmu . Iŋuc epie sisipiric ɋeŋfâfâc jaha fisi-jareocmu .
Eme Jesu e sabata hombaŋ hesifuckewec â Anuture Mamac-nane muhuc Anuture sâcko šuhuckewec , Judaŋic jaŋe wiac jajahec irec erâ mana gâpârerâ qaniŋte mumbiŋ .
Ŋoŋe wiac ebac epo Irec manasu-fârehuc mumutâc dâŋnanere sâcko jueŋgopieŋ , irec manape biaŋkekac .
Dawidizi ere hâcne kecšiŋuc muwec : ` No Wofuŋ hone dendeŋnehuc mi beheekopac , e fâre-naneo domahame biric boroc mi epemu .
Ŋoŋe fufua ɋâri i ukic sisirowenaonec mâcne , mi sisirowenaonec , Anuture dâŋ jujune â fofo sanaŋ , irecnec âkešurâ fuambiŋ .
Irec ŋoŋe ɋiɋic qaniŋte sâqocne mumufuac erâ nunumuzi dodopec enšepieŋ . Ŋic tiŋne moczi numume tâpirinehec eocmu .
No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazape mananiŋ : Moc e no manasiŋnuocmuzi juju sanaŋhec eocmu .
No behec-ŋopape bekâ mâsiŋ erâ mi juniŋmu . No ŋoŋerao risie warepemu .
Iŋuc aricne . Judaŋic jaŋe wiac bocjaha tahac-jopakicne . Jaŋe hâcne Anutuzi biŋedâŋ fuŋne fuŋne jazame irec rune embiŋ .
Kiŋaŋ qaqa ŋoŋe mâreŋ ŋicbomboŋfâc-ŋeŋic araŋ bajarehuc , maŋŋeŋiczi qâzuc foha , Kristo ecneŋgopieŋ tinac , mana mezac ehuc micjeŋic reŋkenšepieŋ .
Me Wofuŋzi buuruc â wama ruaine sâc fekicne egarehuc akicguhuc jume go wemocte manatâc qatakic ehuc juekic ? Go maŋge bârisiecmurâ Anutuzi buuruc egareekac i mi mana taraekic me ?
Nâŋâc šiŋuc muhuc Anutu bubiaŋ manacneeŋgopeneŋ : Wiac mocte , e jahac maname fokac irec sâcko râehuc numucnepene mana-nâreocmu .
Ʒeŋaŋ rune Anutu e mamanasiŋ-ŋeŋicte bubiaŋ â wama bâfua-ŋareme Tiri Mârore tâpirio ŋesiŋnepie sambâŋ šeŋaŋ-ŋeŋicte manariŋ qâriŋ ŋoŋerao fua ŋeiŋ ezejec .

Á dâŋ dopeckewec ine šiŋuc fuakac : Anutu e juju sanaŋ bâfua-nârewec , â juju sanaŋ irec jâcne ine Ŋokâ-ticne .

E ma tâmiric juhuc Anutu manasiŋkeme kiŋticne behecnewec irec maqâreŋ šâhec râecnewec . Eme Abraham e iŋuc ehuc ine ma tâmiric jaŋe Anutu manasiŋkehuc kiŋfâsâc eeŋgopieŋ jaŋere micne ewec .
Moc e hâmome sâqocnere niŋgiŋ ŋetaracneocmu .
Iŋuc ehuc sahac-nâŋecko Jesu hâmoc-ticnere ma amecke jueŋgopeneŋ , i Jesu juju-ticnere ma iŋuc jaha sahac-nâŋecko fuaocte hâcne .
Ŋic gâcne jaŋe jaŋacnere sawa manasuhuc Jesu Kristo gie-ticnere mi mueŋgopieŋ .
Sara e iŋuc jaha mamanasiŋhecte tâpiri fuacneme ŋokac qizec juipiehuc kiwechec ewec . Ine ɋâricte biŋe qacnewec ere , mume fufuazi mukac , muhuc iŋuc ewec .
Mamac-nanezi norao râec-jopaekac ŋic i jaŋe sipirickenšipiŋte hone qâzuc ejareku dameŋ sâkoo furu jaha wiwic-jopape faharenšoŋgopieŋ ” sorecnuwec ere micdâŋ iŋuc hâcne fokac .
Á nâŋâc ine Anutu Mamac-nâŋec mocjaha junârekac , eraonec hâcne wiac sasawa fua-fârewec â nâŋâc erea juŋgopeneŋ . Erâ Wofuŋ mocjaha , Jesu Kristo , ere meo wiac sasawa â nâŋâc jufâreŋgopeneŋ .

Eme ši Timoteo e risie warerâ mamanasiŋ â maŋjauŋ-ŋeŋicte biŋe biaŋ nâzâwec ” Erâ nâŋere boc manasueŋgopieŋ , â nâŋe ŋoŋe honec-ŋopazo muhapene ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha nâŋe honec-nâpozo mueŋgopieŋ , dâŋ i nâzâ-fârewec .
Eme juku soŋaŋ sâkozi fisirâ hendiŋ huririnehec fofo sanaŋ i heŋareme hume rojuniŋmu .
Mamanac-nâŋec iŋuc fokacte gie maŋafec jaha baeŋgopeneŋ ,
Ŋic izi hâcne maŋ tâmiric , qowi qa nâc ejareeŋgopeneŋ jaŋe iŋucne . Jaŋe wiac fuŋne kâuc baeŋgopieŋ i kosa musuaeŋgopieŋ ” irec qowi sisipiric sipirickeniŋmu ,
E dâŋ i hapetac jaŋere manasuhuc mi muwec , e moneŋ kânoŋ wirec-jeŋic bajuhuc moneŋ hume ro soŋsoŋ ejujec , irec muwec .
Anutu maŋjauŋ-ticne nâŋâcnao fuawec i hone šâŋitac erâ mana šakiembeŋ . Anutu e maŋjauŋte fuŋqizecne , eme moc e maŋjauŋhec juocmu e Anutuzi maŋkeocmu , â eki wâc Anutu maŋkeocmu .
Stefano qarâ opâ ruac gâcne jopa bâtâtiec ejarepie haha rârâwiŋ qarâ tucnezi Foinike â Kipiro nucko â Antiokia haeo rambiŋ . Ra juhuc miti i Judaŋic sawa jazambiŋ .
Miti babajuzi jâmbomac sahacte dope bâbâfua-nârene , mocjaha mukâroŋ tâmiric bajunšepeneŋ .

Erâ Anuture tiriŋicfâc râsi ejarehuc jopa sipiric ejareocte mana fâsâecnekicne , erâ wâc mâreŋne mâreŋne ŋic sahac hawari-jeŋic â dâŋmarac-jeŋic fuŋne fuŋne jaŋe ŋicbomboŋ ejare-fâreocte tâpiri râcnekicne .
Á bahac bâfuarâ šika kihuc rârâŋgeŋ tâmiric jupie mozi maname biaŋkeocmu ? Tiŋne juhuc šika kirâ rârâŋgeŋ tâmiric jupie ine Anutuzi maname biaŋkeocmu .

Irec hâcne Kristo e šâšâfic ɋâricnere jâcne ewec , erâ šâšâfic raŋɋanao juhuc kiŋ bâfuakicne i taraocte hâmowec , eme irec biŋefâc-ticne jaŋe juju sanaŋte merâfâc roniŋte mujarekicne i sâcne roniŋmu .
Eme weniŋuc muzo ? Sâqocnere gie bahuc jaha jupene aki anonoczi fua ɋârâŋkehuc sirickezejec , iŋuc muzo me ?
Dâŋ miminehec , mutucdâŋ , dâŋ simbiŋne , i epie sâqoreocmu . Daŋge mumuteŋ ine epie sâckeocmu .

Eme šâŋe firâ honehape mi becâsic moc sahacne gowaekicne warezejec i ¡ Ŋic fainao ŋewec šâŋene hâmoc . Erâ hârâckoneczi bâjâpembiŋ . Eme mâreŋko rukec jahec â moc mâc fohame moc ira mume šikazi â roroczi â huc mimicnezi â kâte qowi momorizi ŋic sipiric-jopaniŋte tâpiri râe-jarekicne .

Irec hâcne wiac biŋe qanarekicne i mamanasiŋte erâ fuaocmu . Wemocte ? I aki anonoczi feŋeŋ râecneme Abrahamte ɋâricfâc sasawa nâŋâcnao sanaŋkeocte . Sâcmutâc dâŋko roweckembiŋ jaŋe sawa mâcne , Abrahamzi mamanasiŋ hata âtewec ijaha âteeŋgopeneŋ nâŋâcnao mâmâc . Eki hâcne Anuture maio apa wirec-nâŋec ekac .
Eme Romaŋic jaŋe fuŋne-nane mu rituc ehuc nuniŋte kiŋnane basarâ firuecnuniŋte mumbiŋ .
Irec ŋicmaŋte me ŋic eebapare mi muzo , Anutu buuruc-ticnere sawa muzo .
Erâ sasec boe sau wâc mi enšepeneŋ . Jaŋeraonec gâcnezi sasec boe sau embiŋ , ehuc šoaŋ gie bapa ijaha ŋic 23 tauseŋ hâmombiŋ .
Ehame me sahac-naneo sâcmutâc moc fokac izi maŋ mamanasu-nanere dâŋhec rârâsi eekopirec , ehuc niŋgiŋnume sâqocnere sâcmutâc dâŋ me sahac-naneo fic hae ewec ere kâpâcwâru ŋic eekopac

Irec nâŋâc ši Kristore dâŋ maine , fufuŋkeo mumune , i râepene foha dâŋ hukicne , wiac efehuc mumune , i moc šuhuckenaŋ . Wemocte miti hobeteŋne i hâsine râehuc maŋ bâbârisie â juju raŋɋa bebehe â Anutu mamanasiŋ ,
Irec ere manapie wawahane mi ezejec . Erâ aimuŋ ecnerâ bârisiepie norao mocwâc warezejec ” no â opâ ruac gâcne woŋec-ticne juŋgopeneŋ .
Âgofâc-nane , ŋic moczi “ mamanasiŋhec jukopac ” muocmu , ehuc eehâmo gie mi baocmu , e mamanasiŋ-ticnezi moc bafickeocmu me ? Mamanasiŋzi wemocko sisipirickonec bataraocmu .
Eme Jerusalem hae rune jaŋe šiŋuc mumbiŋ : “ Ŋic qazo mueŋgopieŋ ine hâcne ši .
Iŋuc murâ ficnec-joparâ muwec : “ Tiri Mâro ro maŋ eniŋ ,
Jaŋe Anuturaonec kiŋfâsâc eere hata fokac i kâuc baeŋgopieŋte jaŋac tiŋke biaŋ eniŋte giene baeŋgopieŋ . Irec Anutu tiŋne rune mi dapecnembiŋ .

Moc e Anutu Ŋokâ-ticne manasiŋkeocmu , e Anuture dâŋ fârine maŋkeocmu . Moc e Anuture dâŋ mi mana šakieocmu , i Anutu burecŋic mucnekac eocmu . Ŋic iŋucnezi Anutu e Ŋokâ-ticnere dâŋ dopeckewec i maname fâri tâmiric ekac hâcne .
“ No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ mupe mananiŋ : No manasiŋnuocmuzi gie baekopac ijaha baocmu . Erâ i sawa mâcne , sâcnane jâuruhuc baocmu . No Mamactao fepemure iŋuc hâcne fuaocmu .
Kiŋaŋ qaqa jazatec bomboŋfâc-jeŋic jaŋere dâŋ reŋke-fârehuc kiŋaŋ biaŋne qajarenšepieŋ , ehuc micjeŋicko mi ronšepieŋ .
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi Anuture aki anonoc ririzacte soŋaŋ babac enšepieŋ . Erâ ŋondeŋ-ŋeŋicko šâŋ opac moczi gitec herâ šacŋopame sâqorenšipiŋte rucŋeŋic banšepieŋ .
Ŋic ŋokac kikefuŋko mi rašimbiŋ jaŋe wâc manacnepie sâckeekac ŋic iŋucnezi mitire micne juzejec , jaŋe musoriŋkepie Sataŋzi maŋne bâsifuckeme ere bitiŋko kizacte .
Kristo e ŋicne ŋicne mitire kâdoc nârewec sâc bajueŋgopeneŋ .
Eme aŋelo namba 2 eki râqâc-ticnaonec wiac hâwecko hoŋkeme huwec . Hume hâweczi soc tânipu tinac ewec . Eme irec hâwecko qowi hâmo-fârembiŋ .
Ŋoŋe ŋicbomboŋfâc-ŋeŋic maizi qambaraŋ ejarepie honec-ŋopapie biaŋkeocte mâcne , nâŋe Kristore kiŋaŋ qaqa , iŋuc muhuc Anutuzi hata muwec i maŋafec jaha âtenšepieŋ .

Erâ dâŋ i urucko â acmeruŋ ehuc , maŋŋeŋiczi mumu hehec mi eŋareha munšepieŋ . Iŋuc epie , Kristohec juhuc wiac ebac eeŋgopieŋ irec qoric-ŋopaeŋgopieŋ , ŋic i jaŋe burec-jeŋicte fuŋne taniŋkeme mimienšepieŋ .
Ŋokâ hone dendeŋnehuc manasiŋkeniŋmu sâc juju sanaŋ rauckeniŋmu ” Mamac-nanere micdâŋ iŋuc hâcne fokac . Eme noni dameŋ sâkoo bâɋârec-jopazokopac . ”
Eme mi qatara-jarehuc Anutu âkehockewecte Wofuŋte aŋelozi ɋeŋnea qawec . Eme umbeŋzi nanšaŋneme hâmowec .
Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere Mamac â Anutu muteŋkenšepeneŋ . E buuruc Mamac â bâbâmiriŋ rune juekac .
Ŋic tucnezi ine miti hata i qâsorierâ dâŋ jawane fârimâc bâfuambiŋ bajuŋgopieŋ .
No Biŋebiaŋte manape mimi gaŋgaŋnehec mi eekac , i Anuture tâpirihec , irec mana sakac eniŋmu sâc bâpiaŋ-jopaocmu , Judaŋic hâcne , erâ Grikŋic mâmâc .
Wâtuŋ huwec domakac , Jesu Kristo hâcne , e unucke behec erâ moc râepene huhune mi fokac .
Ŋoŋe ine ŋic sasawa sahac-ŋeŋic jauŋ baeŋgopieŋ sâc ijaha ŋonâŋfâc-ŋeŋic jauŋ bacjopanšepieŋ . Á ŋokac ine ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic araŋ bajarenšepieŋ .
Ŋoŋe mârâc jaha ma tâmiric juhuc sâqocne kosa barâ hâmocne juhapie Anutu e kiŋŋeŋic behehuc Kristohec bâɋârec-ŋopawec .
Micne bapa jaŋe Mâroraonec dâŋ mufuahuc mejeŋic qizecgao râehuc jambuŋgumbiŋ , jambuŋ irec fârine sifucke-garezacte bâiŋ basawec ezemec .
Eme no sambâŋ ɋâricne â mâreŋ ɋâricne honec-jofapo . Sambâŋ raŋɋane â mâreŋ raŋɋane jahe ine sirowepic . Erâ hâwec iŋuc jaha arictac ewec .
Bubiaŋ faio jurâ jurahuc junšepieŋ .
Eme dameŋ ira ŋic jaŋe hâmoniŋte biŋe muniŋmu erâ mi hâmoniŋmu , hâmoc hefâre-bipiepie sifu mi maic-jopaocmu .
Nâŋâc Jesu hâmorâ faharewec dâŋ i maŋkerâ šiŋuc mananšepeneŋ : Anutu e Jesu ecneme hâmokicne jaŋe e jahacnehec amec-jopa fisiocmu .
Eme ŋic moczi Jesu e Anuture Ŋokâ jâmbâŋ dâŋ i mutaniŋkeocmu , e Anutu maŋkeocmu â Anutuzi wâc e maŋkeocmu .
Qâpuc juju râpeckerâ maŋraŋɋa-ŋeŋic burec ehuc sasecko sipirickeekac , i heunuckenšepieŋ .
Motâc no hâcne . Moc e fotâcnurâ rašiocmu , e mi sipirickeocmu . E rašic wefuc ehuc nânâ mâriri bâfuaocmu .

Tucne jaŋe qânâzi hehâmoc-jopakicne , tucne jopa qâšâic ejarekicne , tucne jaŋe segezi bâtâc-jopambiŋ , tucne jaŋe šikazi upe-jeŋic qâtâcnembiŋ . Jaŋe lama â noniŋ sahacne rufarâ rorocko juhuc bebekâne erâ šâŋ goma faio jujumbieŋ .
Anutu e tiŋne juekac , ŋoŋe iŋuc manaeŋgopieŋko ine ŋic moc tiŋnea jume honerâ munšepieŋ , Anuturaonec fuawec .
Wofuŋ e irec hâcne kecšiŋuc munârewec : ` Noni go ŋic qâpuc jaŋere šoctamac râecgupore bâbâpiaŋ-jeŋic juraku mâreŋ qaŋeŋnao jutarazemec . Ž ”

Ehuc bahac , mimi fuazacte soŋsoŋko eene , i râpecke-fârembeŋ Me sioc faio juhuc Anuture dâŋ bâbâsifucke i wâc mi eeŋgopeneŋ , aricne Nâŋe Anuture maio miti mutaniŋkehuc ŋic jaŋere maŋ bâmiriŋkepene fuŋne-nâŋec manaeŋgopieŋ .
Eme Anutu mefârenao risie feme Tiri Mâro biŋe qanâre-kicne e hâcne Mamaczi qikiŋnecneme soreme wahame fuŋne-ticne hone manac eŋgopieŋ šine hâcne .
maŋɋâri-ŋeŋic hepie hume rojuŋgopieŋ . Maŋ i hâcne bâbâfuazi bâpiaŋkeme mamanahec erâ e jahacne hawari iŋucne fuahuc jukac .
Eme Jesuzi biŋe manarâ šiŋuc muwec : “ Huc irec fârine hâmoc fuaocte mâcne , Anuture mumuteŋ fuaocte mukicne . Anutu ŋokâ-ticne ere sambâŋ qâreŋ fua taniŋkeocte hâcne . ”

Biŋebiaŋko hâcne Anuture tiŋne fua taniŋkeekac , i hâcne eki mamanasiŋhec jaŋe tahac-jopaekac , ehame mamanasiŋko utuckeniŋmu . Dâŋqâreŋ šiŋuc hâcne fokac : “ Biaŋkekicnezi mamanasiŋte erâ juju hotâckeocmu . ”
Eme momori jaŋe Jesu rorâ maripoŋ râcnepie hâpome mâreŋ moc šâŋene Utusiec , Judadâŋko Goligata , ira barambiŋ .
Mitire tâpire fuŋne fuŋne i aki anonoc nâre tahac ekicne sâc fonâre rakac . Eme irec sâcko gie banšepeneŋ . Irec moc e Anuture micdâŋ mumufuare tâpiri focnekacko mamanasiŋ-ticnere sâcko muzejec .
Moc e laioŋ hawari iŋucne , moc e bulimakao ŋicne hawari iŋucne , moc e šâŋe maine ŋic hawari iŋucne , moc ine tucwipe fahareekac hawari iŋucne .
Ŋoŋe juju bapa-ŋeŋicte ruc bahuc junšepieŋ . Erâ mutuc matacne mâcne , maŋ mamanasuhec junšepieŋ .
Judaŋic â Grikŋic bârâwiŋ mi eŋgopeneŋ , e mocjahazi Wofuŋ junâre-fâreekac , erâ wiac fuŋne fuŋne hezu henâreekac .
Ŋiczi mamanasiŋhec erâ kiŋfâsâc bâfuanaŋte Kristozi sâcmutâc dâŋte hata hebâzicke-nârewec .
Wiac irec me irec mana mezac mi ee maŋŋeŋicte dâŋ fuŋne fuŋne i Anutu daŋge nunumu ecnehuc mutaniŋkecnenšepieŋ .
Jaŋerao wiac fuawec i uŋsawaŋ-nâŋec ekac , jaŋe sâqocnere andac embiŋ iŋuc jaha enšipeŋte .
Eme hârâcte tapa rome hosâc sâko wefuwec , gie šame hosâc feekac , irec sâc hosâc wefu ferâ šoaŋ â sawa sâocke-fârewec .
Moczi moc aka huckehuc wiac iŋucnao âgo-ticne mi eatuckezejec . Wofuŋ e wiac irec okacne bazu-fâreocmu ” nâŋe dâŋ i mârâc jaha mujomirerâ ŋazambeŋ .
Irec ŋic moc Kristorao šuhuckeekac e fuŋmoc eekac . Ine wiac raŋɋane omaewec , ŋicbureŋ , wiac ɋâricne fuawec .
Mamac e Ŋokâ honebâckeekacte gie baekac sâc jâutu-fâreekac , erâ gie ši honeŋgopieŋ sawa mâcne , fekicne sâko jâutume ŋoŋe honerâ wareckeniŋmu .
Fiuc rorozi fiuc qikiŋnerâ meticnezi gie šoɋac bahuc nânâ mafa bâfuarâ waha qaqane boki bajarezejec .
Ŋoŋe nunumuzi bataracnupie Wofuŋzi no bâriesiecnu-ŋareme fâpemurâ mukopac , eme go irec ŋeŋe hewâneŋke-narezemec .

Mu qaqazuc dâŋ kosane hazec furu ŋazapie izi maŋŋeŋic mi hesifuckezejec ” maŋŋeŋic aki anonoczi keteŋneme qiŋ herâ fome biaŋkeocmu , wiac nâkicnezi sâcne mi basanaŋkeocmu . Hata i âtembiŋzi fârine mi bâfuambiŋ .
Âgo bureŋ , wiac mocte esoc-ŋopaŋgopeneŋ : Ŋoŋerao šâic gie baeŋgopieŋ â Wofuŋte erâ micne baŋareeŋgopieŋ â mu bâtiŋ eŋareŋgopieŋ i jaŋe sâsec-jopanšepieŋ .
I Judaŋic jaŋere hâwic-jofame iŋuc mupic . Jaŋe dâŋ šiŋuc mujomirembiŋ : “ Moc e Jesure Kristo mume miti sakarecnenšepeneŋ . ”
Anutu maŋzi kiŋaŋ qacneeŋgopeneŋ â Kristo Jesurao qohotaeŋgopeneŋ â mamanasiŋ-nâŋec sahacko mi râeeŋgopeneŋ , nâŋâc hâcne ma fârine bajueŋgopeneŋ .
Sâcmutâc dâŋticne kecšiŋuc fokac : ŋokâ-ticne Jesu Kristo ere šâŋe manasiŋkehuc maŋzi jauŋ babac enšepeneŋ . Iŋuc hâcne enaŋte munârewec .
Eme mâreŋmaŋkonec qowi mimicne moc wefume honepo , e lama iŋucne šuŋene jajahec sawa fowec . Dâŋticnezi ine oâdâŋ .
Âgofâc , dâŋ mana wosâc eere mamana-ŋeŋiczi ɋie jaŋere sâc mi ezejec , sâqocnere i ɋiene jaŋere sâc enšepieŋ , â mana wosâcte ine maŋ mamana-ŋeŋiczi sokakicne jaŋere sâc ezejec .
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi šâic busâqocko juocmu , e Anutu numucnezejec , me moczi bubiaŋko juocmu , e mumuteŋ gae hezejec .
Eme ŋoŋe meŋeŋic betaŋkekicne â hoqaŋeŋ-ŋeŋic ŋetarakicne , irec âte tiŋnehuc sanaŋkenšepieŋ .
Ŋoŋe Mamac mucnehuc wâsickeeŋgopieŋ e ra rowec ware rowec mi ehuc juju bapa-nâŋecte sâcko dâŋnâŋec mutaraocmu ” irec ŋoŋe mâreŋko jaba juhuc sâc e araŋ bacnehuc junšepieŋ .
Irec ŋoŋe sasanaŋ bâfuarâ Anuture micdâŋkoa juku wiac biŋe qaŋarekicne irec fârine ronšepieŋ .
Wiac biŋe qanârekicne i manapaŋkerâ irec woŋec juju , â wiac mi hohonene maŋzi sakarerâ babaju , izi mamanasiŋ ekac .
No Wofuŋte maio ŋaza-jâmbâŋkepe : Ŋoŋe qâpuc , maŋ mamanasu-jeŋic wiac jawanere foekac , jaŋere sâc mi junšepieŋ .
Ŋic moczi nânâ qowi soware me sabata hombaŋ me mosa hombaŋ i me i ŋeŋere me mi ŋeŋere mu supaic mi eŋarezejec .
Irec ši Anutu eri ŋeŋe-ticnere maŋfuŋko juhuc ŋafe furec ufuŋ-ticnao kiŋaŋ qacneeŋgopieŋ . Ehame eri ŋeŋeo ŋeekaczi qâtec-jopahuc sâoc-jopaocmu .
Eme Paulozi hurâ motec fofackerâ hâporâ ŋic šiŋuc jazawec : “ Ŋoŋe ki ojowa mi eniŋ , e mâro-ticne fuakac . ”
No šâic gie sasawa i Anutu bâwosâefâc-ticne jaŋere erâ ŋetâcneekopac , jaŋe Kristo Jesure bâbâpiaŋzi ŋihe umbiŋ ejareha eri tatamac fofone mâmâc rauckeniŋte iŋuc eekopac hâcne
Ŋoŋe mitio ââgo ehuc meo babac efârenšepieŋ . Kristohec jueŋgopieŋ ŋoŋerao wama fofârezejec .
Ŋoŋe Kristo araŋ bacnehuc micrereŋ eec efârenšepieŋ .
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane , uŋdâŋ qanaŋ ŋazakicnere ŋic kosa jujune jaŋere mumusifuczi maŋŋeŋic bâŋgoroŋkeme dockenšipiŋte sawaŋ-ŋeŋic qahuc junšepieŋ .
Ŋokac ŋoŋe ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere rereŋfâc junšepieŋ , Wofuŋte biŋe ekicnezi iŋuc epie sâckeocmu .
Moczi bahac bâfuame âgo guru jaŋere maio mu bâtiŋ ecnetec gâcne jaŋe manahuc hâwic-jopazejec wâc .
Irec nâŋâc dâŋ mumutarac mi enšepeneŋ . Kecšiŋuc ine ezo : Ŋoŋe âgo gâcne maŋ bâsifuc ejarehuc mamana sâqoc bâfua-jarenšipiŋte manabâcko junšepieŋ .
Tiŋne Juniŋmu sasawa , Judaŋic hâcne â Grikŋic mâmâc , jaŋe eri tatamac â wama fua-jareocmu .
šocbâruŋ fâro-ticne hemâteŋkembiŋ , šika faio feipiehuc ɋâricne jumbiŋ , dockekicnezi mocwâc sanaŋkembiŋ , šikao momori wânšâŋ embiŋ , mâreŋ gâcnaonec râsi jopa jâpec embiŋ .
Ʒi moczi moc neneŋ gie mocwâc mi narezejec . No Wofuŋ Jesure râfu qâreŋ sahac-naneo fome bajuekopac .
Jorocfâc-nane , ŋoŋe ine tiri mamanasiŋ fârine izi ŋesiŋ ŋeŋarehame sanaŋkerâ junšepieŋ . Ehuc Tiri Mârorao roweckerâ numuhuc junšepieŋ .
Erâ juju bapa-ŋeŋiczi miti tâmiric jaŋere sâc mi ezejec . Ŋoŋe maŋ mamanasu-ŋeŋic bâtikiepie hawarine moc eme Anutu micdâŋ-ticnere sâcko gie biaŋne â hohone šiziwene â tirine irec wosâenšepieŋ .
No aposolo waha qaqane jâmbâŋ , no Anuture kikefuŋ guru jopa sipiric ejarepore aposolo šâŋe munarepie mi sâckeekac .
Maŋŋeŋic mâreŋko me mâreŋte wiacko mi râepie fozejec . Moc e maŋticne mâreŋko râeme foocmu , e wemocko Mamac maŋjauŋ ecneocmu .
Irec ŋic go wemocko fuŋnege murârâŋnecmu ? Ŋic gâcnezi bahac bâfuapie mana sâqore-jarehuc gahacne fuŋne bataniŋkeekic hâcne . Mana sâqore-jareekomec , go ijaha hâcne eekomec i ¡

Eme Wofuŋ e gie tahacke-narewec , i Jakobo , Kefa â Johane jaŋe Jesure kikefuŋ guru jaŋere jâcne jumbiŋzi mana tararâ no â Banaba âgo bacnâfohuc menâhecko bambiŋ , erâ nâhe qâpuc jaŋerao gie bahapere jaŋe jaŋac ŋic mahec jaŋerao baniŋte mumbiŋ .
Eme momori jaŋe Jesu maripoŋko qarâ ŋaqi-ticne faine bâtâcnepie jahec â jahec eme ru sâc embiŋ . Á ŋaqi-ticne maŋne hâfâ iŋucne oorâŋ fukicnere
Go iŋuc muekiczi ŋic gâcne miti qazu-jarehuc gahacne maŋ mi qazucneekic . Go ŋic fiuc mi ronšepieŋ jazahuc gahac fiuc roekic .
Me ŋoŋe šiŋuc mi manaŋgopieŋ , sahac-ŋeŋic i Tiri Mârore ufuŋ , e ŋoŋere sahacmaŋko ŋeŋe juju eocte Anutuzi râe-ŋarewec . Ŋoŋe maŋ sahac rune aricne .
Kristore maŋjauŋzi maŋnâŋec fenšoŋkehame juhuc šiŋuc mana sanaŋkeeŋgopeneŋ : Mocjahazi okac-nâŋec hâmowecte mâmâc sâko hâmombeŋ ekac .
Mitiŋic âgofâc-nane , sambâŋte mâmâc hefârec-ŋopakicne , ŋoŋe miti kiŋaŋ ŋic â taha bapa sâko Jesu , šâŋene murâ rereŋ eeŋgopeneŋ , erao findendeŋnenšepieŋ .

No wiac fuŋne fuŋne qaŋeŋke-ŋarepo , ehuc gie ɋicwânšâŋ bahuc gegec dodocne jaŋe bâmec bajarezo irec hatane wâc âtehuc ŋowatupo . Eme ŋoŋe ijaha âtehuc Wofuŋ Jesuzi dâŋ kecšiŋuc muwec i manasunšepieŋ : ` Bâmec ro nâc eere bubiaŋzi mâcne , bâmec babajare irec bubiaŋzi fârine jâmbâŋ eekac . Ž ”
Ŋowe ŋonâŋ jujure manapie wiac fârine eha fofo wirecko gâc mi hezejec . Boe sau â šuhuc bâtâc eeŋgopieŋ jaŋe Anutuzi okacne jareocmu .
Ra fisirâ hawecmaŋko mi rašihuc mâc okarierâ fime rašime qoruc râpâ sawa fome honewec .
Eme bâbâric â ɋuŋ parandaŋ â micfânâŋ fuawec â homeŋ kâcɋene sâko jâmbâŋ bawec , sâc iŋucne moc ŋic fuarâ juwarembiŋko mi bawec .
Nâŋe ine Anutuzi Mâro-ticne ecneme dâŋ i mufua-nârewec . Mâro e wiac sasawa irec fuŋne mana gufuc efâreekac . Anutu e jahacne fuŋne bâutuckekicne i mâmâc manaekac .
Irec fâme bubiaŋ manacnehuc Wofuŋte erâ âgo ecnenšepieŋ . Ŋoŋe ŋic iŋucne hâcne sâsec-jopanšepieŋ .
Naru motec ŋoŋe neŋgoc mamacfâc-ŋeŋic dâŋ mupie sâc reŋkenšepieŋ , iŋuc epie Wofuŋzi maname biaŋkeocmu .

Nâŋe nâŋâcnere piticne mana biaŋkeeŋgopeneŋ ine kecšiŋucte : Maŋfâsâc â mitio maŋtaniŋ jupene maŋnâŋeczi wiac mocte tutuc mi qanâreekac . Nâŋe miti tâmiric jaŋere maio iŋuc hâcne juhuc miti mamana ŋoŋere maio wâc jujâmbâŋkeeŋgopeneŋ . I mâreŋko maŋɋârâŋ dâŋ fokac ira siŋkehuc mâcne , Anuture uruc jauŋko siŋkehuc eeŋgopeneŋ .
“ Moc e micdâŋ-nane bajuhuc sâseocmu , eki maŋjauŋ enareocmu . Eme moc e no maŋjauŋ enareme Mamac-nanezi e iŋuc jaha maŋjauŋ ecneocmu , â no nahac wâc maŋjauŋ ecnehuc fuŋne-nane mutaniŋkecnepemu . ”
Ŋic iŋucnezi maŋɋârâŋ hawari erâ “ bâtâcko â sowa juhuc sahac bâpitiwazo ” iŋuc mupie dâŋ izi fârine tinac eekac . Erâ wiac iŋucnezi fârine aricne , izi sasec aka sâcne mi hecneocmu .
Ŋic jaŋe šira kikefuŋte maio jauŋgere mu warec embiŋ . Ŋic fâpie go Anutu šâŋe biŋe-ticnere erâ hone jauŋ ejarerâ râec-jopatec rapie biaŋkeocmu .
Mugufuc dâŋ mutucne â racne igockezemec , irec fârine mu qaqatarac sawa fuaekac i manakic .
Nâŋâc ine šâŋe mai-nâŋec foŋ tâmiric fokacte Wofuŋte tatamaczi âke tamaec-nâpome bâtikiepene wefuekac , ehuc Wofuŋte hawari sâc erâ tatamacheczi tatamachec eeŋgopeneŋ . I Wofuŋ Mâro ere mâsi .

Kristo e ine Mâro juweczi jukac eki neŋgoc ŋecneha maŋ sahac-ticne Anutu taha bâzi furu biaŋ ecnewec , eme nâŋâc eebapa aputacnezi maŋnâŋec hegâpârembeŋ i Kristore soczi sâcne šure ɋaɋackeme Anutu jujune kiŋaŋ qacnenaŋmu .
Eme nâŋâc Wofuŋ Jesu Kristo manasiŋkehapene wiac tahacke-nârewec , ijaha jaŋe tahacke-jareme no iŋucnezi wemocko Anutu qataracnezapo . ”
Anuture Tiri Mâro mi qaisockenšepieŋ , e hâcne roroc-nâpo dameŋko maqâreŋ-ŋeŋic eocte tahac-ŋopakicne .
Go wiac gare tahac ekicne â gaza qazuc ekicne , i heɋârerâ aimuŋ bajuhuc maŋge bârisiezemec . Mi ɋâretecne ine râsi fifisi tinac fisi-garepemu , go šâfo-nane moc mi manahaŋtec biac fisipemu hâcne .
Naru motecfâc-nane , moczi moc maŋ bâsifuc eŋarezo mupie mi mananšepieŋ . Moc e tiŋne hata âteme ere ŋic tiŋne muzo , e Jesuzi juju tiŋne juekac , iŋuc jaha juocmu .
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane , mâro kosa jaŋere dâŋ mi mana šakienšepieŋ . Mâro moc e Anuturaonec me mâcne , i mana taraniŋte ruc banšepieŋ . Porofete burecne wemo afecne fuambiŋ juraŋgopieŋ .
“ Qomâfâc-nane , ŋazape mananiŋ . Sâqocne bâbâtâmire i ŋic eki hâcne bâfuawecte irec dâŋzi maic-ŋopakac .
Âgofâc-nane , moc mupe . Wofuŋte erâ bubiaŋhec junšepieŋ . Dâŋ hâsine ijaha qâreŋke-ŋarezore manape mi quŋkekac , â ŋoŋe ine hume keteŋ eŋarezejec .
Moc e nânâre boc ecneme qanaŋ e jahacne ficko nâzejec , tutumaŋ bâbâsifucne epie okacne fua-ŋarezacte . Dâŋ gâcne i no nahac fârâ mutâcne-ŋarepemu .
Mupie Pilatozi šiŋuc jazawec : “ Ŋaŋacne sâcmutâc dâŋ sâcko dâŋticne mutaracneniŋ me . ” Eme Judaŋic jaŋe mumbiŋ , “ Nâŋe ŋic hâmocko rârâec-jopare aka henârekicne . ”
Ŋoŋe mitire kadahe fekicne bâfuaniŋte šoɋac enšepieŋ . Eme noni irec hata biaŋne jâmbâŋ ši ŋowatupe honeniŋ .
Taha bapa sâko-nâŋec hâcne e furu , bahacmâc , ɋaɋacne , sâqocne bapa jaŋere sâcko mi juhuc qâtâcnerâ pectâc jujune , erâ sambâŋ hucke-fârewec jukac . Iŋucnezi hâcne junâreme sâcke-hâmokac .
Tâpiri nareme sanaŋkeekopac , ere erâ jupe bape sâcke-fâreekac .
Anutu e šiŋuc hâcne muekac : Boe sau qikiŋnehuc maŋɋaɋac junšepieŋ .
Paŋšâic jaha numuhuc junšepieŋ . Erâ rucgereŋ juhuc daŋge nunumu enšepieŋ .
Eme Mose e dâŋ i manarâ izia wiserâ ra Midiaŋ mâreŋko ŋic furune jaŋere ŋondeŋko juwec . Erâ ŋokac bame ŋokâ jajahec fuacnepic .
Ŋic e ine qizectuc juzejec . E Anuture hawari â Anuture eri tofa bakicne irec . Ŋokac e ine ŋicte eri tofa bakicne .
Erâ Kristore wamazi maŋŋeŋicko guriŋne bazejec . Ŋoŋe wamahec erâ me sahac mocjahao juniŋte rocŋopakicne hâcne . Erâ wâc daŋge mumuteŋ ehuc junšepieŋ .
Wiac sasawa irec rune â bâbâfua e naru motecfâcne bocjaha eri tatamac-ticnao jowac-jopaocte manasuhuc bâbâpiaŋ-jeŋicte micne bapa e šâic serereŋ gie baku mao fisiocte mucnewec i sâcke-hâmowec .
Ŋoŋerao šika â rârâsi foekac i fuŋne weniŋucte ? Me sahac-ŋeŋicko andac forakac izi hâcne šika gie baekac .
No šiŋuc ine jâmbomac mupie manaekopac : Ŋoŋerao mamakâc hâhâwicne , qâpuc jaŋerao mi fufuane , iŋucne fuawec fokac . Ŋic moczi mamac-ticnere ŋonâŋhec juekac , irec mukopac .

Ŋoŋerao eesâic fua warewec i ŋic tâpiri-ŋeŋicte sâcko fuawec . Erâ Anutu e mume sasanaŋzi eesâic baafeckeme tâpiri-ŋeŋicte sâc mi jâuruocmu . Erâ eesâic fuaocmu sâc âte sâoc-ŋopame sâcne sanaŋkeniŋmu .
No manakopac , no behec-ŋopape kâte qâto mimicne ŋoŋerao fisirâ lama mi akic-jopaniŋmu ,
Erâ ŋoŋe fific guguriŋ eŋarepie šâic busâqochec juhuc mamanasiŋ-ŋeŋic mi ŋeŋgoroŋkeha sifu sanaŋkerâ jueŋgopieŋ , irec dâŋ binaŋ hae sâc Anuture kikefuŋfâc ejareeŋgopeneŋ .
Ŋiczi Anutu hohone i moc mi ekicne , maŋzi jauŋ babac enaŋmuo ine Anutu maŋkenaŋmu , eme maŋjauŋ-ticne nâŋâcnao fua sarickeocmu .
Paulo no aposolo , ŋiczi mi sorecnumbiŋ â ŋic moczi gie wâc mi munarewec , Jesu Kristo â Anutu Mamac e hâmockonec bâɋâreweczi gie i munarewec .
Sâqocne bapa jaŋe mukac mupe mo iŋucne ecnepie mana-bipierâ sanaŋkewec , ŋoŋe ere hâcne manasuhuc mi takirepie maŋŋeŋic betaŋkezejec .
Nâŋâc hâmoc-ticnere hawari ehuc erao šuhuckembeŋte fafahare-ticnao sâc i jaha ehuc šuhuckenaŋmu .
Erâ dâŋ moc kecšiŋuc fokac : “ Ŋic qâpuc ŋoŋe Anuture fuŋfuŋfâc jaŋehec mu šeri enšepieŋ . ”
Mâro e qanaŋ šiŋuc mujaŋgeŋkerâ muekac : Juku šâhec ŋic tucnezi miti beherâ maŋ bâsifuc bâbâfua jaŋere eeatuc dâŋko â demoŋ jaŋere burecdâŋko qohotaniŋmu .
Go dâŋ heɋâre-jarehuc jazatec ŋic jaŋe kia gawamaî â fekicne araŋ bajarehuc dâŋjeŋic reŋkenšepieŋ , erâ gie biaŋne fuŋne fuŋne fokac irec afeckerâ banšepieŋ .
Jaŋe fuŋne šiŋuc mana-bipiehuc dâŋ i mueŋgopieŋ : Sambâŋ e mârâc jaha fuawec â mâreŋ e iŋuc jaha . I Anutu dâŋticnere opâonec fuarâ opâheckoaŋ fowec .
Kristo e iŋuc jaha tiŋnezi sâqocnere erâ arec moc hâmowec , e tiŋnezi hehesicne ŋoŋere erâ iŋuc ewec , Anuturao râec-ŋopaocte . E sahachec juwecte qapie hâmowec , â Mârohec juwecte ɋârewec .
Ŋic iŋucne jaŋe tiŋne hata kâuc bahuc mi âtepie muzac boc mi sâqorezac ” â hata i âtekicnezi tiri sâcmutâc dâŋ qazu-jarekicne i mocwâc igockehuc hata raŋɋanao risiepie ine sâqoreekac .
Âgofâc , Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere micte ŋazapene mananiŋ , dâŋ qazu-ŋarembeŋ i opâ ruac gâcnezi mi reŋkehuc kosa jueŋgopieŋ , ŋic i jaŋehec mi junšepieŋ .
Irec šiŋuc mananaŋ : Ŋic mocjahare erâ sâqocne mâreŋko fuawec , â sâqocnere erâ hâmoc fuawec , ehuc ŋic sasawa jaŋerao fotâcnewec . Iŋuc fuame ŋic sasawa sâqore-fârembiŋ .
Jaŋe mamanasiŋhec jumbiŋte ŋic guru sâko bawahac-jopambiŋ . Bâbâtiŋ gie bâhâmombiŋ , wiac biŋe qajarekicne irec fârine rombiŋ , laioŋ micjeŋic bâbâzickembiŋ ,
fific guguriŋ faio juipiehuc sifu mamac babasa mi eeŋgopeneŋ , qa imac enâre-bipiehapie sifu hâmo sipiric mi eeŋgopeneŋ .
Oi , šâšâfic hehetâc ŋic ŋoŋe ¡ Mâreŋko wiac fokac irec biŋe juocmuzi Anutu râpeckeocmu , i mi manaŋgopieŋ me ? Irec moc e mâreŋkopec wiac kosa âgo ecneocmuzi Anutu kisâ ecneocmu .
Eme Asia mâreŋko miti murazo mupie Tiri Mârozi hecke-jareme Frigia â Galatia mâreŋ fotâcnehuc rambiŋ .
Á mamanasiŋte tiŋke biaŋ eere dâŋ ine kecšiŋuc fokac : “ Go maŋgezi šiŋuc mi muzemec : Mozi sambâŋko ferâ Kristo bawahaocmu ,

Eme aŋelo namba 1 eki rarâ râqâc-ticnaonec wiac hoŋkeme mâreŋko huwec . Hume ŋic qowi mimicnere šâŋe qâreŋ bajumbiŋ â hawari-ticne dieŋzi hecnembiŋ jaŋe wicšâhâc šâic sisiac-ticnehec mâretec fua-jarewec .

Papia foforiŋ rome wiac jujune 4 â ŋicqizec 24 jaŋe Lamare maŋfuŋko fodapembiŋ . Jaŋe musi-jeŋichec sasawa , â râqâc golzi bakicne i mâmâc barâ fombiŋ . Râqâc maŋkonec hosâc âsu biaŋ wefuwec , i Anuture tiriŋicfâc jaŋere nunumu .
Ŋic moczi Jesu e Kristo muhuc mana šakieocmu , e Anuturaonec fuakicne muzo . Eme moc e mamac bâbâfua maŋjauŋ ecneocmuzi ɋâricfâcne mâmâc ejareocmu .
Sahaczi fecko fec ehuc hehesuac mi enšepeneŋ , erâ wâc iiŋguuŋ mi eec enšepeneŋ .
Ŋicqizec moc dâŋ âzâcnemurâ fâfâcnehec mi ecnezemec , mamac-nane muhuc urucko mu tutuc ecnezemec , ŋicmotec hahac ɋafâc-nane muhuc sâcjeŋicko jaza bâtiŋ ejarezemec .

Ehuc qâpuc jaŋere ŋondeŋko juju tiŋne junšepieŋ . Iŋuc jupie qâpuc jaŋe fuŋne-ŋeŋic hone mana tarac erâ , sâqocne bapa muŋareeŋgopieŋ , i beherâ juku Anuture iiqic dameŋko eehâmo gie-ŋeŋicte erâ Anutu muteŋkenšepieŋ .
šoɋac-nanere erâ kikefuŋ jaŋere râsi epo , sâcmutâc dâŋ sâcko tiŋne juju â bahacmâc jupo .
Mupie ɋiɋic qawec dameŋ irec mu indiŋ ejareme mumbiŋ : “ Jacne šoaŋ šâšâŋiŋ ŋehame ira hucticne âke niniŋkejec . ”

Eme Judaŋic jaŋe teuŋko rašimbiŋte šiŋuc mumbiŋ : “ Tomâcko sabata hombaŋ sâkoo ŋic jopakicne jaŋere qâŋɋâŋ maripoŋko mi domazejec . ” Iŋuc murâ Pilato âzâcnepie momori jaŋe ŋic siec-jeŋic qazurâ qâŋɋâŋ-jeŋic bataraniŋte Judaŋic mana-jarewec .
Dâŋ i manarâ Pilatozi Jesu akickezo mume Judaŋic jaŋe owa ruruckerâ mumbiŋ : “ Go ŋic e akickerâ Sisare ª âgo mocwâc mi jucmu . Moc e jahacnere ŋicwofuŋ muhuc Sisa âkehockeocmu . ”
“ Ŋoŋe fâfârerâ maŋŋeŋic mi gâckezejec . Anutu manasiŋkehuc no mâmâc manasiŋnunšepieŋ .
Keketeŋ epie kisâfâc-ŋeŋic hâhâwic heŋarepie hâbi-ŋeŋic mi goroŋkezejec . Iŋuc epie Anutuzi jaŋe behec-jopaocmu â ŋoŋe rocŋopaocmu irec fuŋne bataniŋkeocmu .
ŋoŋe no mi rowosâecnumbiŋ , noni ŋoŋe rowosâec-ŋopapo , erâ ra juhuc fârine bâfuaniŋte muŋarepo . Eme fârine bâfuapie fofonehec ezejec . Iŋuc erâ nore šâŋe bajuhuc Mamac numucnepie sâc ŋareocmu .

Mamanasiŋhec juhuc Abezi Anutu bâzi rikecneme honeme sâckeha Kaiŋte qikiŋnewec . Mamanasiŋ-ticnere hâcne Anutuzi honeme kiŋfâsâc eme bâzi-ticne rohuc fuŋne-ticne bataniŋkewec . E mamanasiŋhec juwecte manapene hâmokicnezi sifu dâŋ nâzâkac ekac .
Ŋoŋe nâŋere manapie Kristore kiŋaŋ qaqa â Anutu boreŋ šeŋaŋ-ticnere soŋaŋ ezejec .
Á bâpiŋ jaŋe mâŋâŋzi nemuja qâmârâŋkeme wahaekac , iŋuc sambâŋkonec mârâŋkerâ wahambiŋ .
Irec hâcne , âgofâc-nane , ŋoŋe nemu qaŋgec wiacte geŋkerâ junšepieŋ .
Sâqocnezi go mi bawahacguzejec . Aricne , go wiac biaŋne ehuc sâqocne bawahazemec .
Go dâŋ i heɋâre-jarerâ Anuture maio mujomirehuc jaza sanaŋketec dâŋ racnere mu iigoc mi enšepieŋ . I wiac fârimâc , iŋuc ehuc miti mamana sipiric-jopaniŋmu .
Ŋoŋe Anutu maickepie eki wâc maic-ŋopaocmu . Sâqocne bapa , maŋŋeŋic ra qa ware qa eekac , ŋoŋe meŋeŋic šurerâ maŋŋeŋic baɋaɋackenšepieŋ .
Á ŋic sâctiri ejareniŋmu , ine bahac bâfuapie sâcmutâc dâŋzi qaqatara ŋic eŋgopieŋ irec fuŋne bataniŋkeocmu .
Maŋwânâŋhec junaŋte aricne , maŋɋaɋac junaŋte Anutuzi hefârec-nâpowec .
Ŋiczi ine Anutu qamaserâ sindaŋ ehuc kike hata-ticne hesifuckeeŋgopieŋte kimbeŋ ticnezi sambâŋkonec fua taniŋkeekac .
Jorocfâc-nane , nâŋâc maŋjauŋ eec enšepeneŋ . Maŋjauŋ i Anuturaonec . Eme moc e maŋjauŋhec juomu , e Anuturaonec fuakicnezi Anutu mana maŋ eekac mucnezo .
Eme ŋic moc e âgo-ticne qaisockeekaczi “ no tatamacko jukopac ” muocmu , ere dapâcko juweczi jukac muzo .
Ŋoŋe Kristo šâŋe biŋe-ticnere musoc qâsoriŋ-ŋopapie manapie šerine ezejec . Wiac i eŋarepie tatamacte maqâreŋ , Anuture Mâro hâcne , ŋoŋerao waha juocmu .
Fisipie Paulozi mejeŋicko barâ , Anutuzi neŋgoc ŋesiŋ ŋecnehame qâpuc jaŋerao miti gie bame fârine fuawec , irec dâŋ binaŋ ninic jaha ejarewec .
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi sâcne nore bahac moc muocmu ? Eme no sâc iŋucnezi dâŋ fâri qizecne ŋazape wemocte mi mana šakieeŋgopieŋ ?
Erâ šuhuckekac , “ No kiŋjeŋic behe-jarepemu â sindaŋ-jeŋicte mocwâc mi manasupemu . ”
E miti mumure aafec â mamana fuŋne fuŋne aameo tahac-ŋopawec .
Âgofâc-nane , no Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere erâ â Mârore Jauŋte erâ hazec qâuŋ ŋazakopac , ŋoŋe nore erâ Anutu numucnehuc juju gie-nanere baficnunšepieŋ .
Mume ŋic omane sâko jaŋe mumbiŋ , “ Go demoŋzi maŋge bâsifuckekac . Mozi guzo mukac ? ”

Eki mume Jesu e socticnezi sâqocne-nâŋecte erâ taha bawec , eme e manasiŋkeniŋmuzi taha i biŋeckeniŋmu . Sâqocne ewarehuc jukicne irec kiŋ i Anutuzi buuruc-ticnere râeme fowarehuc juwecte Jesu hâmocko râewecko tiŋnere fuŋne bataniŋkewec .
Eme kiŋaŋ motec â momori jaŋe mâmâteŋte šoc ruqerâ ruahuc domahapie Petoro e ŋondeŋ-jeŋicko rarâ iŋuc jaha šoc ruawec .
Erâ Anuturaonec sându maro šika wiac ro barâ juhapie Sataŋzi rucko râsi fisi-ŋareme hâbi-ŋeŋic rorâ jâpenšepieŋ .
Eme Petorozi šiŋuc muwec : “ Wofuŋ , no wemocte šiŋuczia sâcne mi fâpemu ? No gore erâ juju-nane sâcne qikiŋnepemu . ”
Eme Anuture wama e ŋic mamana sirickeekaczi maŋ mamanasu-ŋeŋic qâzuckeme Kristore fosanaŋkeocmu .
Nameŋ-nâŋeczi Wofuŋ Mamac muteŋkeeŋgopeneŋ , erâ nameŋzia ŋic Anuture hawarifâc sâwec-jopaeŋgopeneŋ .
i ŋic qâpuczi sasecŋic me bâkiri bapa â fiuc serereŋhec me bawe qaŋgec wiac babaju jueŋgopieŋ jaŋere mi mupo . Jaŋe mâreŋ behehuc behec-jopazo i sawa fokac .
Erâ no nahacnere mupe , no Jesu Nazarete haeonec ere šâŋe biŋe imackepe sifuckeocte gie-nane ewec .
šâŋe-jeŋiczi sasec šâŋe fifi , sâqocne gapecmâc ee , ŋic biric borocne wiac iŋucnere doc babac-jopa , moneŋ mafare harac eku maŋjeŋic ekicne , ŋic iŋucnezi hârâcte biŋe hâcne ¡
Soŋaŋ jabane , lama ru jeŋic mi juekaczi ine kâte qâto fisime honerâ lama behec-joparâ wiseocmu . Ehame kâte qâtozi lama ki bâtâtiec ejareocmu .
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane , mananiŋ . Ŋiczi dâŋ mamanare afeckenšepeneŋ , dâŋ mumure â aaricte ine ŋemâckenšepeneŋ .
Eme Wofuŋ e Biŋebiaŋ mumu ŋic nâŋe iŋuc jaha Biŋebiaŋzi sahacte dope wiac kifua-nâreocte muwec .
No šoc tatamaczi mâreŋko wahapo , eme moc e no manasiŋnuocmuzi dapâckonec wefuocmu .
Izi šâhec Jesuzi ŋic e taha ufuŋko bâfuarâ uŋ šiŋuc âzâcnewec : “ Go sahacge biaŋkejec , eme wiac ŋemâc bâmâcne jâmbâŋ fua-garezacte sâqocne mocwâc mi bazemec . ”
Erâ wiac sasawa maŋjauŋhec enšepieŋ .
Maŋŋeŋic nore qikiŋneeŋgopieŋko micnane reŋkeniŋmu .

Ŋoŋe dâŋ ŋazaekac e râpeckenšipiŋte ruc bahuc junšepieŋ . Mârâc jaha mâreŋko waharâ dâŋ jazame qikiŋnepie okacne fisi-jarewec . Eme ši sambâŋko juhuc dâŋ nâzâekac , e râpeckerâ wemocko okac tâmiric junaŋmu .
Ŋoŋe mârâc jaha Anuture kâuc bahuc nemu , Wofuŋ fârine mi jujune , jaŋe kiŋaŋ qajare jumbieŋ .
Ŋoŋere hâcne Anutuzi qanaŋ manasurâ Ŋokâ-ticne soreme waha fuawec , i ŋoŋe sasawa sindaŋ hata-ŋeŋickonec bârisiec-ŋopahuc jambuŋ-ŋopaocte iŋuc hâcne ewec . ”
Eme Judaŋic nâŋere mâreŋko â Jerusalem haeo wiac muwec bawec i nâŋe hone manac efârembeŋ . Ehame juku maripoŋko qapie hâmowec .
Âgofâc-nane , no Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo šâŋe-ticnere erâ uŋdâŋ ši mupe mananiŋ : Ŋoŋe dâŋ fuŋne fuŋne â fâfâuc mi bâfuanšepieŋ , aricne . Maŋ mamanasu-ŋeŋic bâturepie mocjaha eha junšepieŋ .
Ŋoŋe mârâc jaha Anutu râpeckerâ nâme nikecne erâ sâqocne fuŋne fuŋne bahuc maŋšârâhec jujumbieŋ .

Socɋârizi wiac fuŋne fuŋnere andac eeŋgopieŋ i bâec bazemec . Ehuc maŋjeŋic biaŋkekicnezi Wofuŋ mu wâwâsic ecneeŋgopieŋ jaŋe bafic-jopatec tiŋke biaŋ eere â mamanasiŋte â maŋjauŋte â wamare henširiŋnenšepieŋ .
Ŋoŋe Kristo fafahare-ticnao šuhuckembiŋko ine faic Anuture maŋfuŋko Kristo jukacko wiac fokac , irec henširiŋnehuc junšepieŋ .
Ehuc aŋelo namba wâŋ eki qeŋ qame hoe sanaŋ â šoc sochec bâsifuckekicne izi mâreŋko hewec . Heme mâreŋ tucne šoczi šawec â jâc tucne â sopâc kecɋaŋ sasawa šoczi šafârewec .
“ Wofuŋ Anutu bapafâre , jumeŋzi juekic , nâŋe go daŋge mumuteŋ egareŋgopeneŋ . Go tâpiri sâkoge qaratietec fuakac , ehuc Wofuŋ giege fuŋkerâ bataniŋkekic .
Eme Jesuzi šiŋuc âzâcnewec : “ Go Anutu jauŋ-ticnere fuŋne â opâre gazakopac nore fuŋne mâmâc kâuc bakic . Mana tararâ muzac numu-naretec opâ fifisine garezapo . ”
Juku Kristo e juju runâŋeczi fua taniŋkeme ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha ehec mâmâc tatamac huririnao fua taniŋkeniŋmu .

Qâreŋkekicne mac kecši ine šiŋucte qâreŋkekicne : Ŋoŋe wose manac erâ Jesu e Kristo , Anuture ŋokâ , dâŋ i mana šakienšepieŋ , erâ e jahacne manasiŋkehuc šâŋe biŋe-ticnere erâ juju sanaŋhec enšepieŋ .

Nâŋâc ine Anuturaonec , eme moc e Anutu hone šâŋitac eekaczi dâŋnâŋec manaekac . Anuturaonec mi fuakicnezi ine dâŋnâŋec qikiŋneekac . Dâŋ fâri qizecnere mâro â bâbâsifuc mâro jahere fuŋne iŋucko hâcne šâŋitaeŋgopeneŋ .

Ŋic i jaŋe hâcne nânâ qowire harac ehuc fisi tutumaŋ-ŋeŋic hehegâpârene , mimi tâmiric nâ areŋ eene , karorac hoe mi hehuc mâc mâŋâŋzi ficneme rame arictac eekac irec sâcko jujune , jâc garaŋ garaŋne , fâri tâmiric , hâsi fâri hâmokicne , qâqâfiene , ŋic iŋucne tinac hâcne ,
Erâ wâc âgofâc-jeŋic huc šâichec hatao fofo â kanše faio kecšiŋuc muhuc râec-jopambiŋ : Petorozi rac warec eme nâkumuc-ticnezi foninipec-jopazejec .
Erâ neŋgocne sâko ine mamanasiŋzi maro-ŋeŋic eme dameŋ sâc he bâfeŋnerâ domahapie sâqocne runere šoc tepe moteczi kisowarierâ hâpozejec .
Gie-ŋeŋic sasawa i ŋic jaŋere erâ mâcne , Wofuŋte erâ aafec faio banšepieŋ .
Erâ ŋoŋeraonec moczi Esaure hata mi âtehuc sasecŋic â ŋic araŋ bapa tâmiric mi ezejec . E nânâ mocjaha mac irec erâ mârâc fufuare merâfâc qikiŋnewec .
Eme jaŋe harierâ owackehuc mumbiŋ : “ Aricne , e mâcne , Baraba akicke-nârec . ” Baraba e ine šikaŋic .
docbapa , enšaŋaucne , pepecne , sasecte aŋac kâcɋene bajuhuc Anuture aŋac mi mamana ,
Iŋuc ewecte Anutuzi bafehuc fekicne sâko âkendâŋnewec . Âkendâŋnerâ šâŋe biŋe-ticne fuŋmoc izi haŋ bahuc ŋic šâŋe biŋe getâcke-fâreocte mucnewec .
Nâŋe Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo tâpiri-ticnere â fifisi-ticnere dâŋ ŋazambeŋ , i nemu binaŋ ŋic mamanao fuakicne mi ŋazambeŋ , nâŋe bapa fuŋfuŋ domahuc Wofuŋ tatamac-ticne fuame honembeŋ .

E papia qâreŋkehuc sâc dâŋ i mufua rawec . Papia-ticnao dâŋ gâcne fokac irec fuŋne qame hukicne . Eme dâŋ iŋucne i ŋic mutucne â biric borocne jaŋe musifuckeeŋgopieŋ . Erâ i ere papiare sawa mâcne , miti papia gâcnere mâmâc ehuc sisipiric maickeeŋgopieŋ .
Eme aposolo jahec Banaba â Paulo jahe i manarâ fâfâre sâqorehuc hemâtâc-jofame ŋic bâfâuc bâfâuc-jopa
No kecšiŋucte ŋazakopac : Anutu e mimiŋnefâc-nâŋec biŋedâŋ mujâmbâŋkehuc jazawec i fârinehec eocte Kristozi mahec nâŋere kiŋaŋ qaqa ewec .
Moc e mitio jukopac muekaczi micbipic-ticne mi soŋaŋkehuc maŋticne eatuckeekac , ŋic iŋucnere mitio juju i racne eocmu .

No dâŋ moc kecšiŋuc ŋazapo irec manasunšepieŋ : Kiŋaŋ qaqazi bomboŋ-ticnere sâc sirickerâ jujune mi fokac . Jaŋe no râsi enarembiŋko ŋoŋe râsi jaha eŋareniŋmu , jaŋe nore dâŋ mana maŋ embiŋko ŋoŋere dâŋ iŋuc jaha mana maŋ eniŋmu .
Eme e manasiŋkembiŋ Judaŋic jaŋe hâcne šiŋuc jazawec : “ Ŋoŋe nore dâŋko juhuc ine motec fuŋfuŋfâc-nane eniŋmu .
Âkendâŋneme juhame roroc fuarâ Aigita â Kanaaŋ mâreŋko qarâ suriŋkerâ fome hae mâreŋ hâŋkewec . Eme mimiŋnefâc-nâŋec jaŋe nânâre hâmohuc jumbiŋ .
Naru motecfâcge gâcne Mamaczi sâcmutâc dâŋticne nâzâwec reŋkehuc dâŋ fâri qizecne sâcne bajueŋgopieŋ , fuŋne-jeŋic iŋuc manarâ bunane boc biaŋkewec .
Moc e wiacfâcne â soctofafâcne hone jauŋ kime dopec mi ejareocmu e miti beherâ qâpuc sanaŋ ewec mucnezo .
Irec nâŋâc mamanasiŋzi maŋnâŋec baafeckeha siocmâc mai ecnehuc junšepeneŋ . Ine qanaŋ maŋnâŋec kiŋzi hegâpârekicne i socticnezi ruacneme taniŋkeha â sahac-nâŋec opâ ɋaɋaczi šureha iŋuc sâcne enaŋmu .
Jaŋe nore biŋedâŋ šiŋuc sawa manambiŋ : “ Nâpo jâpec enârehuc miti ima qaocte muweczi ŋic miti i hâcne jazahuc juekac . ”
Irec ši nânâ nâniŋte ŋazape mi qataraniŋ . Nânâ nâqiŋnerâ sâcne tiŋko ferâ juniŋmu . Qizec susuc-ŋeŋic moc mi waharâ sifuckeocmu . ”
Erâ sasanaŋhec juhuc nore erâ šârâ hâriŋ faio tatakic tâmiric jumeŋ .
Ehuc mutec ŋic kâcɋene jaŋe sowa bâtâc â metâne â wama ruaine jupie mamanasiŋ â maŋjauŋ â maŋuruc furu fojarezejec .
Qâpuc juwefuhapie hone akic eŋare warehuc juwec , irec dameŋ tarawec . ši ine mâreŋ sâc ŋic mâmâc sasawa maŋjeŋic bârisieniŋte mujarekac .
Momori jaŋe iŋuc hâcne embiŋ . Jesure maripoŋ fuŋko ine šiŋuc domambiŋ : Neŋgoc-ticne â neŋgoc-ticnere qo , erâ Maria Kelopa ere ŋonâŋ , â Maria Madala haeonec .
Mâc gâcne ŋoŋe mana jaŋgeŋkehuc nâeŋgopieŋzi âgofâc-ŋeŋic miti afecne fojareekac jaŋe maŋ bâsifuc ejarenšipiŋte manabâc enšepieŋ .
Jesu bâɋâreme faharewec e šâhec hâhâmo i mocwâc mi bâfuaocmu , irec Anutuzi dâŋ kecšiŋuc muwec : ` No Dawidi biŋe qacnepo irec fârine fofo sanaŋ i hâcne tahacke-ŋarepemu . '
Dameŋ ira , Mamaczi no maŋnuekac â noni ŋoŋe maŋŋopaekopac , â ŋoŋe no maŋnueŋgopieŋ i mana taraniŋmu .
Anutu mana maŋ eeŋgopeneŋ , ine sâcmutâc dâŋticne mana rereŋ epene fuŋne jaŋgeŋkeme mananaŋmu .
No irec hâcne ŋazakopac : ŋoŋe sâqocne-ŋeŋichec juku hâmoniŋmu . No jukopac ši fuŋne-nane ŋazaekopac i mi mana šakieniŋmuo , sâqocne-ŋeŋic foŋarehame hâmoniŋmu hâcne . ”
Eme ŋokac e tiriŋic â Jesure mumutaniŋfâc jaŋere soc nâku maŋne bibiriwame honepo . Honerâ bipic tatara enarewec .
Ŋoŋe ere manaeŋgopieŋ , e šâhec jambuŋ rozo mume sakarecnekicne . E wiac ewec i suame arictac eocte kio-bipiehuc emâmâŋkewec .
Á ŋic omane sâko jaŋe ere dâŋ bocjaha mufembiŋ . Ehuc gâcnezi mumbiŋ , “ E ŋic biaŋne , ” â gâcnezi qatararâ mumbiŋ , “ Aricne , e ŋic maŋ bâsifuc ejareekac . ”
Eme Wofuŋzi tâpiri sicne-jarehame jazapie ŋic guru sâko jaŋe manarâ maŋjeŋic bârisierâ Wofuŋte biŋe embiŋ .
Anutuzi honec-nâpome sâckeme Biŋebiaŋ muromackenaŋte betoŋ-nâpowec irec sâc mueŋgopeneŋ . Ŋiczi mana-nârepie biaŋkeocte aricne , Anutu e maŋ hohonezi mana-nâreme biaŋkeocte mocjaha mueŋgopeneŋ .
Anutu e Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ecneme jujure tâpiri bâfua-nâreekacte muteŋkenšepeneŋ .
Hozec fârine ine e jahackoaŋ juhuc Anuturao roweckeekac , ehuc ŋafe furec nunumu wâwâsic ecneekac .
Juwarembiŋ ira nore šâŋe bajuhuc mi numu jumbieŋ . ši ine numurâ ropie bubiaŋ-ŋeŋiczi fua sawec erâ fufuse fozejec .
Go kiŋaŋ qaqa juhaŋtec hefârecguwecko manabâc tâmiric Juzemec . Mâc firuecguzo mupie mi qikiŋnezemec .
Ŋic iŋucnezi hâcne fâfâuc bâfuaeŋgopieŋ , erâ Mâro tâmiric maŋ qâŋɋâŋne jueŋgopieŋ .
Ŋoŋe Kristore aki anonocko râec-ŋopahuc hefârec-ŋopawec ehec jupie mi šoraha e râpeckehuc miti fuŋmoc irec hazec rârâe eŋgopieŋ , no irec wareckekopac .
Ŋoŋe ŋic mâmâc sasawa jaŋehec wamao jujure giene banšepieŋ , erâ maŋfuru erâ juniŋte henširiŋnenšepieŋ , maŋwânâŋhec juku Wofuŋ hohone i mi fokac .
Mupie šiŋuc jazawec : “ Woke fâreopec wasaŋ behepie qowi jowaocmu . ” Mume wasaŋ behepie qowi mâretec jâmbâŋ jowa susuckeme fâre-bipiembiŋ .
Mahec juju me ma tâmiric juju izi fârine mâcne , Anuture sâcmutâc dâŋ rereŋ izi fârine ekac .
Uŋsawaŋ dâŋ muekac e irec tâpiri focnekacko muzejec , bâmec gie baekac e maŋticne bawahahuc bazejec , moc e micne juocte mucnekicko šoɋachec juzejec , â moc e jauŋ gie baocmuzi buafec jaha bazajec .
wio-jarehuc muwec , “ Ŋoŋe miti manahuc Tiri Mârohec embiŋ me mâcne ? ” Eme jaŋe mumbiŋ , “ Aricne , Tiri Mâro jukac biŋene moc mi manambeŋ . ”
Ʒi papiao dâŋ qâreŋke-ŋareŋgopeneŋ , i ŋic moczi qikiŋneme fuŋne-ticne mujaŋgeŋkerâ behepie buc juhuc mimiezejec .
Âgofâc , dâŋ moc ši mupe mananiŋ : Mâreŋ sahac-nâŋeczi Anuture uucmaŋ sâcne mi rauckeocmu , â wiac gârecke šaŋ eenezi wiac fofo sanaŋ mi wâc rauckeocmu .
Ŋoŋe gie banšepieŋ , erâ nânâ sisirowenere mâcne , juju sanaŋte nânâ irec giene banšepieŋ . Ŋic Fâri Wâtuŋne eki , Anutu Mamaczi kamac sarahuc âkendâŋnewecte , juju sanaŋte nânâ i sâcne ŋareocmu . ”
Moc i numu-bipiehuc wiac mi roeŋgopieŋ , ine maŋŋeŋicko dâŋ sâqocne šiŋuc foha numueŋgopieŋte : “ Wiac fua-nâreme samarierâ andac-nâŋecte fârine bâfuanšepeneŋ . ”
Erâ Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristore erâ dameŋ sâc Anutu Mamac wiac fuŋne fuŋnere daŋge mumuteŋ ecnenšepieŋ .
Abraham e iŋuc hâcne ecnekicne . E Anutu manasiŋkeme kiŋfâsâc mucnewec .
Erâ hae i mosa šoaŋzi mi âke tamaeekac , Anuture eri tatamaczi batamaeekac â Lamazi šoc tatamac-ticne eekac .
Anuture Mârozi maŋŋeŋicko fic hae ewecko ine maŋraŋɋaopec mâcne , Mâroraopec utuckerâ jueŋgopieŋ . Moc e Kristore Mâro tâmiric juocmuzi ere ŋicbiŋe mi juocmu .
Erâ wâc tieŋne raŋɋane jaŋe maŋsanaŋ-jeŋic beheniŋmuo Anutuzi mocwâc râe šuhuc ejarezo murâ sâcne ejareocmu .
Erâ micjeŋickonec burecdâŋ moc mi wahawec , jaŋe bahacmâc .

Erâ moc mufua-garepe manac : Hata ɋâri sureeŋgopieŋ i âteekopac mueŋgopieŋ , ine jâmbomac eekopac . Erâ jaŋere dâŋmiti bajuhuc sâcmutâc dâŋqâhâcko miti qâreŋkekicne fokac â porofete mu qâreŋ embiŋ i manape fârine ehame mimiŋnefâc-nâŋec jaŋere Anutu kiŋaŋ qacneekopac .
Wiac omanere tofa bazupie tarazejec , maŋjauŋte tofa mocjaha babazuc epie tatarane ine mi fokac . Maŋjauŋhec juekaczi sâcmutâc dâŋ reŋkekac muzo .
Eme ŋic jaŋe šoaŋ fâroroc-ticnezi boc rikec-jopame Anutu , micticnere wiac micne momori iŋuc fuawec , e šâŋe biŋe-ticne musâqorembiŋ . Erâ maŋjeŋic sifu mi bârisierâ Anutu mi sâsembiŋ .
Qânâsac sâko šoricnezi hae râreckekac . Sac i motâc-ticne 12 , erâ motâc botâŋnao aŋelo moc moc doma rapie 12 jaha ekac , erâ wâc motâc sâc Israe ŋicguru 12 jaŋere šâŋe qâreŋ forakac .
Dâŋqâreŋ moc šiŋuc fokac : “ Ŋic jâcko ɋetic-jopakicne jaŋe sâwecte biŋe . ” Eme Kristo e nâŋâcnere iŋuc hâcne erâ sâwec hotâckewec , ehuc sâcmutâc dâŋte sâwec i bâsue-nârewec .
No mârâc jaha Judaŋic jaŋere guruo juhuc wiac epo , i ŋoŋe manaeŋgopieŋ . No Anuture kikefuŋfâc jopa jâpec ejarehuc mâretec sipiric-jopapo .
Erâ e oâ , homa raŋɋa , demoŋ micne Sataŋ hâcne , e rorâ kâpâcwâruzi bândeŋnerâ jara 1 tauseŋ niŋgiŋhec foocte mucnerâ
Eme hae ijaha qaŋgec bapa moc juwec , šâŋene Simoŋ . E jahacnere no ŋic fekicne muhuc qaŋgec gie bame Samaria ŋicguru jaŋe honepie bipinehec ewec .
Erâ no Kristo maŋzi hemiriŋkepe fafahare-ticnere tâpiri norao fuame šâic manawecko šuhuckerâ ehec manazepac . Eku hâmoc-ticnere hawari wâc bâfuazepac .
Go ŋic miti giere fâro ehuc biac mi jambuŋ-jopazemec , jaŋere kiŋzi gore faio fezacte . Gahacne maŋ sahac soŋaŋketec ɋaɋacnea fozejec .
Erâ ŋokac kâcɋene iŋuc jaha jazatec miti ŋokac fârine erâ gupe micko âkec tâmiric â nârâmbe tâmiric juhuc juju biaŋte qaqazu enšepieŋ .
Irec ŋic moc e otâ-ticne ŋicne ŋicko râeme sâsâckecne eocmu , â moc e otâ-ticne sakareme ine sâcke-hâmoocmu .
Ŋoŋe mitidâŋte fârine bâfuanšepieŋ , mâc hazecte nâpene sawa eme maŋŋeŋic eatuckeniŋmu .
Jerusalem haeonec Judaŋic jaŋe Jesu qaniŋte dâŋ qacnepie Judaia mâreŋ-jeŋic qikiŋnerâ Galilaia mâreŋko sawa rac warec ehuc juwec .
E mitio juju-ŋeŋicte bâbâfua i Kristo Jesu râe-nârewec . Kristo e hâcne Anutuzi maŋɋârâŋ dâŋte rowaŋ-nâŋec â kiŋroro-nâŋec â maŋɋaɋac bâbâfua-nâŋec â kikitâc-nâŋec râe-nârewec .
Erâ opâ râqâcko qame hume fuŋkerâ motecfâcne kike šure-jarewec . Ehuc gie qoruczi bâkereŋke-jarewec .
Ehuc miti ɋâricne ši omaeocte no râsi ecnehuc ŋic mecne ŋokac mecne mâmâc jaha niŋgiŋ-joparâ kâpâcwâru ficko râec-jopahuc jupo .
Ŋic jaŋe Jesure iŋuc muhuc fâuckembiŋ .
Anuture lama guru soŋaŋ-jopaniŋte muŋarekicne , i jâiŋko mâcne , buafec jaha hone maiŋ ejarenšepieŋ , erâ moneŋ mafa huhurere manasuhuc mâcne , giere buâkec eŋareha enšepieŋ .
Sâqocnezi hâmocte šârâ ekac , â sâcmutâc dâŋte erâ sâqocnezi tâpirinehec ekac .
Manaŋgopieŋ , padi qaŋarepie gie furi sakare-jarembiŋ irec kiŋzi hohosâcne qakac , erâ qa roro ŋic jaŋere kio wâwâsiczi sambâŋ momori jaŋere Wofuŋte hazecko huwec .
Ŋoŋe sindaŋ â burec wiac â eeatuc â iiŋguuŋ â gupe micko âkec i hetara-fârenšepieŋ .
Ŋokac moc e ŋowe-ticne juocmu sâc gâjoŋnao bohotarâ domazejec . Ŋowe-ticne hâmome ine ŋic moc me moc rozo murâ rozejec , erâ kosa ehuc mâcne , Wofuŋtao roweckehuc ezejec .
Jahe dâŋ fâri beherâ mukopirec , fafahare i biac fuawec . Iŋuc muhuc ŋic gâcne miti ba imac ejarekopirec .
Kristo Jesurao fisirâ mahec juju â ma tâmiric juju irec mâmâc jaha fârimâc muzo , mamanasiŋte qâreŋ maŋko fuame irec mocjaha fârine muzo .
Erâ wiac emataucke-fârerâ mume rereŋfâc-ticne sasawa jaŋere bâbâpiaŋ tatara tâmiric bâfuawec .
Mitiŋic jaŋere moneŋ râezo murâ ine Galatia mâreŋkonec kikefuŋ guru jaza mutâc epo ijaha enšepieŋ .
Ŋonâŋ ŋoŋe Wofuŋte rereŋfâc juŋgopieŋ iŋuc jaha ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere junšepieŋ .
Eme Jesuzi ŋic dâŋ moc šiŋuc šuhuckerâ jazawec : “ No mâreŋ sâc ŋic ŋoŋere šoctamac . Eme moc e no bâjâpecnuocmuzi dapâcko mi rahuc juocmu . E jujure tatamac focnehame juocmu . ”
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane , ŋoŋe ine Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo aposolofâc-ticne jaŋe qanaŋ dâŋ mumbiŋ , irec manasuhuc junšepieŋ .
E ufuŋ ŋicmezi bakicne ira ŋeŋe juju mi eekac , erâ wâc wiac moc basame ŋiczi gie bacnehuc wiac bâbâfuacne mi fokac . I aricne , ekizia ŋic nâŋâc juju â mâro â wiac sasawa nâre-fâreekac .
Ŋiczi dâŋ dodopec ehuc mupie manapene jâmbomac eekac , â Anutuzi dâŋ moc dopeckeme ine fâri rarau jâmbâŋ eekac . Anuture dodopec dâŋ ine Ŋokâ-ticnere dâŋ dopeckewec i hâcne .
Wofuŋ Jesu Kristo e ŋaqi-ŋeŋic eme rojunšepieŋ Erâ sahac-ŋeŋiczi sasec bâfuazacte mana manahuc jauŋ bacnenšepieŋ .
Israe ŋic jaŋe mamanasiŋhec jumbiŋte Jeriko haesac orâŋkekuhapie šoaŋ gie bapa 7 eme hericke qawec .
Erâ Anutuzi Paulo neŋgoc ŋesiŋ ŋecnehame mâsi šâŋe furu-jeŋic bocjaha bawec .
Eme Jesuzi šiŋuc jazawec : “ No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazakopac , moc e sâqocne baocmuzi sâqocnere kiŋaŋ qaqa eocmu .
Jorocfâc-nane , Anutu e maŋjauŋ iŋucne sâko enarewecte nâŋâc iŋuc jaha maŋzi jauŋ babac ehuc junšepeneŋ .
Go jujure hata nowatumeŋ , maigao šeri bubiaŋ guru dindiŋ bâfua-narecmu . '
Woŋec-nane juhuc miti wose qazuc â jaza qâmoc ehuc juzemec .
Hume serereŋ faio juipiehuc sifu docke šaŋ mi eeŋgopeneŋ . Bebekâne juipiehuc sifu mi mana utuckeeŋgopeneŋ ,
Gâcnezi ine aposolo mufec muriŋ ejarehuc mumbiŋ , “ Jaŋe waiŋ opâ gapecmâc nâmbieŋte maŋjeŋic bibiriwakac . ”
Haesac i qânâ ɋaɋacne , huririnehec izi bakicne , â hae ine goì fifimârâŋne kiruŋ ɋaɋacne iŋucne izi bakicne .
Aŋkeme aŋelo 7 wiac micne momori 7 bajumbiŋ , jaŋe ufuŋkonec wahambiŋ . Jaŋe ŋaqi ɋaɋacne qaŋqaŋ rojumbiŋ , â amec-jeŋicko umbika golzi bakicne fowec .
Ŋopa jâpec eŋareniŋmu jaŋe jambuŋ-jopanšepieŋ . Micŋeŋickonec sâwecdâŋ mâcne , jambuŋdâŋ sawa wahazejec .
Kike jahec-ticne ine aeŋ šocko šahuc bâruŋkeekac iŋucne tinac â dâŋ hawari-ticne opâ sâro fânâŋ tinac .
No biŋedâŋge mutaniŋke-jarepo erâ mutaniŋke-jarehuc jupemu . Eme maŋjauŋ no enaremeŋ ijaha jaŋerao fome maŋjopahuc jupemu . ”
E ŋokâ-ticne mi sakarehuc nâŋâcnere erâ qaisockeweczi ere erâ wiac sasawa mi sesi qeqeric jaha tahac-nâpoocmu me ?
Jaŋe kecšiŋuc ŋazahuc jumbiŋ : “ Dameŋ bembeŋkeme ŋic âke sisicne fuarâ miti imackehuc sasec gie-jeŋicte hešâkiriŋkerâ juniŋmu . ”
go tieŋne raŋɋane mi mana pitiwac-jopahuc maŋfefe mi ezemec . Iŋuc ezicte šiŋuc manac : Go gâtâ gume hesiwiŋ mi ecnekomec , gâtâzi go egareekac .
Erâ nâŋe mitio ŋicbomboŋ eŋarenaŋte mi muŋgopeneŋ , mâc ŋoŋerao bubiaŋ fuaocte babaficko gie baeŋgopeneŋ . Ŋoŋe mamanasiŋko qiŋ herâ domaŋgopieŋ i manakopac .
Betania haeo ŋic moc juwec šâŋene Lazaro , e huc bame fowec . Maria â Mata jahe hahac qozi hae irecteaŋ .
Irec moc e dâŋ i bâsueocmu , e ŋic moc mâcne , Anuctu e jahacne bâsueocmu , Tiri Mâro maŋŋeŋicko râeekac e hâcne bâsueocmu .
Anuture Mâro e šiŋucko šâŋitazo : Mâro moc e Jesu Kristo ŋic fuawec i mutaniŋkeocmu , e Anuturaonec iŋuc mucnezo .
Eme sifu ŋic keci jaŋe wâc iŋuc jaha , guŋko jujune tinac erâ sahaczi mamakâc eeŋgopieŋ , erâ fekicne ro waha âte ejarehuc tatamachec jaŋe wâc musuac-jopaeŋgopieŋ .
Eme sâqocne râpeckerâ wiac biaŋne ezejec , erâ wamao juhuc irec giene fotarierâ bazejec .

Eme irec ŋoŋe mamanasiŋko qiŋ herâ domahuc , Biŋebiaŋzi woworic bâfua-ŋarewec i sifucke-ŋarezacte biric borocne mi enšepieŋ . Biŋebiaŋ i ŋoŋe qazu-ŋarekicne , erâ ŋoŋe sawa mâcne , ŋicne ŋicne mâreŋ sâc jaza rakicne . Paulo no hâcne irec kiŋaŋŋic juekopac .
Iŋuc mume qânâ rorâ hezo epie e fosiroŋnerâ taha ufuŋkonec wahawec .
maŋɋâri hepie huzejec . I hâcne Anuture hawari iŋucne tiŋne â furu jâmbâŋ bâfuakicne .
Dameŋ ira hâcne Anuture sâcmutâc dâŋ reŋkehuc Jesure miti hâwicmâc bajueŋgopieŋ tiriŋic i jaŋe sasanaŋ bâfuanšepieŋ .
Eme Anutuzi hâmockonec bâɋâreme faharewec .
“ No soŋaŋ biaŋne . Soŋaŋ biaŋnezi lama jaŋere erâ juju-ticne qikiŋneocmu .
Ŋoŋe nore manambiŋ , Anutuzi uruc jauŋ-ticnere erâ ŋoŋerao miti gie bapemurâ munarewec .
Ŋic hâme âkefâucne moc uŋdâŋ mocjaha me jajahec âzâcnetecne qikiŋneme behetec buc juzejec .
Jesu e dâŋ iŋuc mume Judaŋic jaŋe manarâ mocwâc mu qaqatarac embiŋ .
Á dâŋticne mana maŋ ekac e Anutu mume sasanaŋ jukac dâŋ i dopeckekac .
Jorocfâc-nane , ŋoŋe wiac iŋucnere woŋec juhuc ere maio maŋfuru â bahacmâc juniŋte wawariehuc wamao jupie honec-ŋopame sâckezejec .
Âgofâc , dâŋ moc fokac mananiŋ : Nâŋere erâ numupie Wofuŋte dâŋzi fofotâc haŋ barame qâreŋ biaŋ-ticne ŋoŋerao fuawec iŋuc jaha fua razejec .
Ehuc šiŋuc manapaŋkeeŋgopeneŋ : Wofuŋ Jesu bâɋârewec eki nâŋe iŋuc jaha Jesuhec bâɋârec-nâporâ ŋoŋehec mâmâc erao râec-nâpoocmu .
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi huc foocmu , e kikefuŋte micne bapa hefârec-jopame fisirâ ere faio numunšepieŋ , erâ Wofuŋte šâŋe muhuc wokemaŋ opâ ruacnenšepieŋ .
“ Juku jara-ticne 40 bazurâ Israe ŋic âgofâc-ticne hone manac ejareocte maŋne afeckeme rawec .
Momori jaŋe ŋic moc bafâŋgopieŋ e Judaŋic jaŋe qazo embiŋ . Eme noni e Romaŋic jâmbâŋ ere iŋuc manahuc momori jaŋehec rarâ mejeŋickonec batarambeŋ .

Dâŋ oowac sâko epie haeŋic mâmâc sasawa maŋjeŋic iŋneme kike saoŋ qajareme fisi qâture-fârerâ tutumaŋ toma-jeŋicko rafârembiŋ , ehuc Makedonia ŋic jajahec Paulo bâjâpepic , šâŋe-jekic Gaio â Aristako , jahe rocjofarâ fârec-jofa rambiŋ .
Ine hâcne Maŋɋaɋac â Tiŋne rune e qikiŋnehuc šika qaqaŋic akicke-ŋareocte mu bâuruec ecnembiŋ .
Jaŋe e manasiŋkepie maŋjeŋic šure bâpiaŋ ejarehuc nâŋâc enârewec sâc ijaha jaŋe ejarewec .
Irec moc e poroŋ â waiŋ nâzo murâ qanaŋ maŋticnere fuŋne hone manac ehuc bajaŋgeŋkerâ nâzejec .
Irec âgofâc-mae , ŋoŋe sanaŋkerâ qiŋ herâ domanšepieŋ , ehuc Wofuŋ gie-ticnere dameŋ sâc henširiŋnehuc banšepieŋ . Wofuŋte erâ gie bapie fârimâc mi eocmu , iŋuc manahuc banšepieŋ .
Eme irec nore kike hata bâjâpehuc juniŋte hazec qâuŋ ŋazape mananšepieŋ .
Eme Anuture maŋɋârâŋ dâŋbiri fua-bipieha ŋic jaŋe jaŋacne mamanazi Anuture fuŋne šâŋitaniŋte emâmâŋkembiŋ , irec Anutuzi maname sâckeme mitidâŋ mutucne i manarâ biaŋkenaŋte muwec .
Ŋokac ŋoŋere iŋuc jaha mupe , ŋoŋe ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere wahamicne junšepieŋ . Eme ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic gâcne miti qiqikiŋ jueŋgopieŋ jaŋe dâŋ mi jajaza mâc rume-jarehuc maŋɋaɋac jupie
Irec nâŋe Kristore biŋe mumuzi Anuture mu baafec dâŋ ŋazaeŋgopeneŋ . Nâŋe Kristo âkehockehuc numu-ŋareeŋgopeneŋ : Anutuhec miriŋ babac enšepieŋ .
E hâcne hâmoczi gozi kime Anutuzi gozi bacneme ɋârerâ faharewec . Hâmoczi e wemocko sakarezac .
Ehuc wâc šâŋe biaŋ fai-ŋeŋicko fewec e musoriŋkeeŋgopieŋ .
waiŋ opâ âmbâŋ mi nâzejec , šikafac aricne , urucne â wamane juzejec , moneŋ mafare mubâre mi ezejec ,
â nore opâ ine gapecnehec , moc e i nâocmu , e opâre mocwâc mi hâmohuc mâc jurašihuc juocmu . Noni opâ i ŋic moc râcnepe maŋticnao opâ šâŋe bâfuacneme juju sanaŋte šâkâŋko rahuc domaocmu . ”
Moc e ine Anuture dâŋ mana rereŋ eocmu , e jâmbomac Anutu maŋjauŋ fârine ecneocmu . Iŋuc ehuc ine Anuturao qohotaeŋgopeneŋ irec fuŋne taniŋkeme mananaŋmu .
Eme no honehape oâre mickonec â qowi mimicnere mickonec â porofete burecne ere mickonec demoŋ repicne jahec â moc qaqec hawari tinac wefumbiŋ .
“ Gahacnere egareekac sâc ijaha âgogere egarezejec ” , sâcmutâc dâŋ neŋgocne iŋuc qâreŋkekicne fokac , i reŋkepie jâmbomac biaŋkeocmu .
Nâŋe miti muhuc nâŋe nâŋâcne dâŋ mi ŋazaeŋgopeneŋ , Jesu Kristo eki Wofuŋ â nâŋe ine Jesure erâ kiŋaŋ qaqafâc-ŋeŋic sawa juŋgopeneŋ , iŋuc ŋazaeŋgopeneŋ .
Moczi moc ba qâsoric eŋarenšipiŋ ine ¡ Kosa jujune jaŋerao qohotaocmu e eebapa biaŋne sifuckecneocmu .
Wama Anutu e lama soŋaŋ sâko Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu šâšâfic fofo sanaŋ irec socte hâmockonec bârisiewec ,

Mocjaha , ŋoŋe kikefuŋte maio Kristore furu Biŋebiaŋ irec sâcko junšepieŋ . Erâ maŋ mocjaha ehuc šâšâfic erâ keketeŋ domahuc Biŋebiaŋte juju gie bapie fârâ honec-ŋopazepac , me taicko juhuc biŋe-ŋeŋic manazepac .
Eme Anutuzi Wofuŋ bâɋârewec iŋuc jaha tâpiri-ticnezi nâŋâc bâɋârec-nâpozokac .
Eme no irec hâcne manasu-gararâ mupe : No menane qizecgao râepe Anutuzi jambuŋ tahacguwec i hehâroŋketec šocne fuazejec .
Eme fuŋne šiŋucte hâmokicne wâc Biŋebiaŋ jazakicne : Jaŋe ŋifec ŋic hata fokac irec sâcko sahaczi okacne roniŋte , â ŋifec Anuture hata fokac irec sâcko mârozi juniŋte .
Ŋoŋe furi-ŋeŋic rokicnere ŋic jaŋere kiŋaŋ qaqa mi enšepieŋ .
Erâ kâroŋ wâc mi qanšepeneŋ . Jaŋeraonec gâcnezi kâroŋ qapie sisipiric runezi sipiric-jopawec .

Nâŋe ŋic gâcnezi eeŋgopieŋ iŋuc mi eeŋgopeneŋ . Ŋic gâcne bocjahazi Anuture dâŋte manapie âbârâ gie-jeŋic eekac . Nâŋe ine maŋtaniŋ juhuc Anuture micte â Anuture maio Kristorao qohotahuc miti mueŋgopeneŋ .
Sanaŋheczi gegec dodocne âsi qataŋ ejarenšepeneŋ , nâŋec nâŋâcnere mamanac mi junšepeneŋ .
Erâ Wofuŋzi mana-nareme no nahac wâc mi šoraha ŋoŋerao fâpemu , iŋuc manakopac .
Eme no šâŋe firâ aŋelo 4 honec-jopapo , jaŋe mâreŋ tuturuŋne 4 ira doma rahuc mâreŋte mâŋâŋ 4 badomambiŋ . Mâreŋko me hâwecko me jâcko mâŋâŋ moc mi qaocte iŋuc embiŋ .

Juwicnao qâpuc wiac šiŋuc ehuc jumbiŋ : Wiac gapec tâmiric ee , sasec , opâ momori âmbâŋ nânâ , bec qowi âmbâŋ nânâ , tiwâ sisiricko nânâ , nemu burec kiŋaŋ qaqajare , wiac i hâcne ewarehuc jukupie micne qawec .
Ŋic moc e râsi ejactezo mume micjekickonec šoc waharâ šaocmu . Irec ŋic moczi râsi ejacterâ sipirickeocmu .
Mupie Paulozi šiŋuc muwec : “ Âgo bureŋ , e taha bapa sâko jukac i mi manahuc dâŋepac . Mitio dâŋ kecšiŋuc qâreŋkekicne : ` Go micne bapa mi musâqorec-jopazemec . Ž No dâŋ i manaekopac . ”
Hae râpenao juniŋmu ine qâto â hafec qaŋgec bapa â sasecŋic â šika qaqa â nemuɋâŋ babaju erâ burec bajuhuc irec aŋac-jopaekac .

Erâ no gore manape piticne babahacnehec ekac . Gore haeo ŋic gâcne juŋgopieŋ , jaŋe Bileamte hata âteeŋgopieŋ . Bileam e Balakezi Israe bitiŋ râe-jareocte âzâcneme eki qafeŋ-jopame ɋâŋte šepec nâhuc sasecko sâqorembiŋ .

Âgofâc , maŋnâŋeczi jâiŋ-nâpome ŋoŋere erâ Anutu dameŋ sâc daŋge âzâcneeŋgopeneŋ . Mamanasiŋ-ŋeŋic boc fua ɋârâŋ eekac , â maŋjauŋ-ŋeŋic fua sawec eme qame qoŋgiŋ eeŋgopieŋ . Eme irec Anutu daŋge âzâcnepene i jâmbomac sâckeekac .
Ŋoŋe mârâc jaha qâpuc juhapie maŋšoc fua-ŋarewec sâc nemuɋâŋ kâpâne jaŋerao ra qohota jumbieŋ .
Ŋowe ŋoŋe ŋonâŋfâc-ŋeŋic maŋjauŋ ejarenšepieŋ . Kristo e iŋuc jaha kikefuŋ-ticne maŋjauŋ ecnehuc ere due bawec .
Sâqocnere okac babazuc mi enšepieŋ . Ŋic âgo ejareekac ijaha enšepieŋ .
Anuture mesanaŋzi bâuruŋ-ŋopame dapenšepieŋ . Iŋuc epie juku dameŋ-ticne maickeme ekizia bafaharec-ŋopaocmu .
Erâ qâoma mi eŋarewec , fuŋne-ticne mananiŋte âgo jauŋ eŋarehuc mume hoe šoaŋ sâckoa eme mâriri fuame nâ šeri ejumbieŋ . ”
Ŋonâŋfâc-jeŋic jaŋe iŋuc jaha metâne junšepieŋ , gupe micko âkec mi enšepieŋ , maŋsowa juhuc wiac sasawa mu bac epie fâri fideteŋ efârezejec .
E maŋticne bârisieocte šâfo bacnepo , eme eki ine maŋticne bârisierâ sasec-ticne beheocte mi muekac .

Herode e dameŋ ira Tiro â Sidoŋ haeonec râsi ejarewec . Eme hae irec rune jaŋe qâturehuc fisirâ dâŋ mufâsâeniŋte ŋicwofuŋte ŋicbomboŋ , šâŋene Bilasto , mu bâmunaŋ ecnepie bafic-jopawec . Jaŋe wiac nareŋ gareŋ-jeŋic tâcnewecte i mocwâc šuhuckeniŋte iŋuc embiŋ .
Eme Jesuzi šiŋuc jazawec : “ No demoŋzi mi enareekac , no Mamac-nane sâseekopac , ŋoŋe ine no ba jawa enareeŋgopieŋ .
Ehuc mâŋâŋ sanaŋne domame siri kâcɋene qame rambiŋ .
Sambâŋko Anutuzi eri aŋac bâfua-nâreocmu , i mâreŋko šâic busâqoc fokac ira sâc hepe mamakâc eocmu .
Naru motec ŋoŋe Jesu šâŋe-ticnere erâ sâqocne bâtâmire-ŋarekicnere dâŋ qâreŋke-ŋarekopac .
Eki hâcne bâpiaŋ-nâporâ tiridâŋ-ticnezi hefârec-nâpowec . I biaŋ-nâŋecte mâcne , e jahac maname fowecte aki anonoc-ticnere erâ iŋuc enârewec . I mârâc jaha jâmbâŋ Kristo Jesure erâ biŋe qanârekicne .

Eme taha bapa micne â ŋicfâc-jeŋic jaŋe honerâ dâŋ ɋeŋɋeŋnehec ehuc mumbiŋ : “ Maripoŋko feoc , feoc . ” Mupie Pilatozi micjeŋicko rorâ muwec : “ No kiŋticne basakopacte ŋoŋe ŋaŋac rorâ maripoŋko qaniŋ . ”
Bâbâpiaŋ i weniŋuc fuazokac , porofete jaŋe mârâc jaha iŋuc wiorâ gufu koparic ehuc jumbiŋ , ehuc ŋoŋerao aki anonoc fuaocte irec findaŋdâŋ muhuc jumbiŋ .
Manakomec , eeatuc ŋic bocjaha fuambiŋ juraŋgopieŋ , jaŋe Jesu Kristo e mâreŋ sahachec fuawec , dâŋ i mickeeŋgopieŋ . Ŋic iŋucne hâcne eeatuc ŋic â Kristore râsi ɋizec mucnezo .
Ŋic kecirec manapene boc sâqorekac , e sopa sâwec-ticnehec , Judaŋic mâreŋ sâc juraŋgopieŋ jaŋe maŋbâiŋ ejareekac , erâ Nazarete rune repicnefâc-ticne jaŋere qizec eki hâcne .

Miti-nâŋecte fuŋne qame hukicne mutaniŋkeeŋgopeneŋ i qeŋ bipinehec : E sahacko fua tâcnekicne , Mârozi fuŋne bataniŋkekicne , aŋelozi honekicne , qâpucko biŋene mukicne , mâreŋ sâc mana maŋ ekicne , eri tatamacko bafekicne .
Á sambâŋkonec hoe sanaŋ hewec , hândâŋne buse iŋucne , izi ŋic hecjopame Anutu musoriŋkembiŋ . Hoe i hâhâwicne jâmbâŋ , ima-ticnehec .
Nâŋâc ine sambâŋ ɋâricne â mâreŋ ɋâricne fuaocte biŋe qanârekicne , irec woŋec jueŋgopeneŋ , eme ira tiŋne jujuzi sâcke-fârerâ fozokac .
Á sambâŋ e ine papia bataforieeŋgopeneŋ iŋuc foforierâ sirowewec . Á tiki â nuc jaŋe . ŋeŋe-jeŋic behembiŋ .
Irec Anuture micdâŋte erâ Jesu Kristo e sahac-ticnezi taha bame maŋfuru embeŋ , i arec mocjaha ekicnezi fofo sanaŋ .
Nâŋe dameŋ sâc ŋoŋere erâ Anutu daŋge âzâcneeŋgopeneŋ , erâ nunumu gie bahuc sâc ŋoŋere manasu-fâreeŋgopeneŋ .
Mume becâsic bâbâroŋ fuawec . Fainao ŋic ŋewec e mâreŋko wama bârârieme ŋic jaŋe qâqâmiziec eniŋte tâpiri râcnekicne . Erâ šika sâko mâmâc râcnekicne .
Kiŋaŋ qaqa juŋgopieŋ jaŋe sasawa bomboŋfâc-jeŋic sâsec-jopahuc rume-jarenšepieŋ , Anuture šâŋe biŋe babawaha â miti susure fuazacte iŋuc enšepieŋ .
Burec eec i wâc mi enšepieŋ . Maŋraŋɋa-ŋeŋic mâsi qâqâreŋ-ticnehec heunucke behec erâ
Erâ no kecšiŋucte gore manape bahacnehec ekac : Goki ŋokac Isebe mana qâoma ecnetec eki , no porofete ŋokac , muhuc ŋicfâc-nane dâŋ qazu-jarehuc qafeŋ-jopame sasec gie bahuc ɋâŋte šepec nâeŋgopieŋ .
Ŋic qâpuc jaŋe Anutu manasiŋkepie kiŋfâsâc bacjopaocmu , irec hâcne mârâc jaha manasuhuc Abrahamte Biŋebiaŋ dâŋ šiŋuc mume miti papiao qâreŋkembiŋ : “ Qâpuc guru jaŋe gore jambuŋko raši-fâreniŋmu . ”
Erâ dâŋ moc “ ŋokâ ” muŋarehuc faŋ qaŋarekicne fokac irec nikec-ŋopawec me ? Dâŋ šiŋuc : “ Ŋokâ-nane , Wofuŋzi bâtiŋgume manatec wawahane mi ezejec , â bâšâicgume maŋge mi rokawezejec .

Micne bapafâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere dâŋ reŋkehuc sâsec-jopanšepieŋ ” jaŋe maŋ qâqâtâc-ŋeŋic hone soŋaŋ eeŋgopieŋzi juku gie-jeŋicte fuŋne mutaniŋkeniŋmu . Irec gie-jeŋic bubiaŋko bapie sâckeocmu , busâqocko bahapie ŋoŋerao wiac sâcne mi biaŋkeocmu .
Erâ Kanaaŋ mâreŋko ŋicguru 7 bâsirowec-joparâ mume apafâc-nâŋec jaŋe mâreŋ i bâtâc barâ ru sâc erâ jumbiŋ . Ehame jara 450 tarawec .
Moc e dâŋ i âke sipurâ moc muhuc Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere dâŋbiaŋ qikiŋnehuc miti hatare sâcmutâc râpeckeekac ere šiŋuc muzo :
Ŋic moc e mu qaqazuc dâŋ i mi bajuekaczi iqic-ŋopazo mume fic sakarecnehuc âgo mi ecnenšepieŋ .
Kristo e šâic manawec irec tofane nâŋerao ɋârâŋne fuaekac , iŋuc jaha bâbâmiriŋ-ticne ɋârâŋnea bâfua-nâreekac .

Jei , jaŋe juku wenac eniŋmu ? Jaŋe Kaiŋte hata âteeŋgopieŋ , â moneŋ mafare harac ehuc Bileamte bâbâsifuc bâfuaeŋgopieŋ , â Kora pepec-ticnere sipirickewec iŋuc jaha pepec-jeŋicte sipirickeeŋgopieŋ .
Ŋic keci jaŋe ine wiac kâuc baeŋgopieŋ i kosa musua fâreeŋgopieŋ , â qowi jaŋere sâc tinac erâ mâc maŋjeŋiczi manaeŋgopieŋ ira ine sâqorerâ sipirickeeŋgopieŋ .

Noa e mamanasiŋhec juwecte Anutuzi wiac šâhec fuaocmu irec biŋe qanaŋ âzâcnewec . Âzâcneme araŋ bacnehuc wiacfâc-ticne ɋâricne juniŋte murâ woke bawec . Iŋuc ehuc ŋic kiŋjeŋicte fuŋne bataniŋkewec . Erâ mamanasiŋte erâ kiŋfâsâc ee irec fârine rauckewec .
Wiac iŋuc râepie fohame fic maŋne maine ira taha bapa jaŋe dameŋ sâc fec wahac ehuc gie-jeŋic bajumbieŋ .
“ Râŋgeŋ qaŋqaŋne ŋoŋe , maŋ hazec-ŋeŋic mi uŋtokicne , mimiŋnefâc-ŋeŋic ejumbieŋ iŋuc jaha ŋoŋe ehuc Tiri Mâro jâpe hetapaic ecnehuc jueŋgopieŋ .

Fuŋne-ticne ine šiŋuc fokac : Sâcmutâc dâŋ i ŋic bahacmâc jaŋere biŋe mi ekac , ŋic sindaŋne , râŋgeŋne , araŋ bapa tâmiric , sâqocne bapa , maŋwânâŋhec , šaubacne , neŋgoc mamac sisipiric , šika qaqa ,
No mârâc papia moc šiŋuc qâreŋke-ŋarepo : “ Ŋoŋe sasecŋic jaŋehec wiac nâ nareŋ gareŋ â iiqic mi enšepieŋ ” ,
Eme Anutu e qanaŋ neŋgoc bumaŋko hone wosâecnurâ uruc jauŋ-ticnere erâ hefârec-nuweczi maname sâckeme
No eebapa-nanere manape ririsi eekac . No wiac moc ezo enare-bipieme mi eekopac , â wiac sureekopac ine eekopac .
Ehuc Wofuŋ â bâbâpiaŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere aki anonocko â fuŋne-ticne mana utuckehuc soka sanaŋ enšepieŋ . E eri tatamac i šiŋuczia focnekac erâ juju sanaŋ dameŋko iŋuc jaha focne rahuc juzokac .
Nâŋe Kristore erâ ŋic mutucne embeŋ , ŋoŋe ine Kristorao šuhuckerâ mamana sâkohec embiŋ , nâŋe gegec dodocne , ŋoŋe ine sasanaŋhec , ŋoŋe fekicne , nâŋe ine waha qaqane .
Eme ŋoŋe mamanasiŋhec qiŋ herâ domahuc e hetapaickenšepieŋ . Erâ šiŋuc mananšepieŋ , âgofâc-ŋeŋic mâreŋ sâc jaŋerao šâic fâro ijaha fua-fârewec fokac .
Kiŋaŋ qaqa ŋoŋe mâreŋ ŋicbomboŋfâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere mic reŋke-fârenšepieŋ , maizi qambaraŋ ejarepie ŋiczi sawa honec-ŋopapie sâckeocte mâcne , maŋsiocmâc Wofuŋ araŋ bacnehuc epie sâckeomu .
“ Ʒuŋene 10 honemec i ŋicwofuŋ 10 jaha wâc , erâ jaŋe gie-jeŋic dameŋ šiŋuczia mi fuŋkembiŋ . Ŋicwofuŋ gie-jeŋic fuŋkerâ qowi mimicnehec dameŋ bembeŋne mac baniŋmu .
Eme nâŋe ŋickonec mâro i mi rombeŋ , nâŋe Anuturaonec miti kâdoc hone mana tarac enaŋte Anuturaonec Mâro i rombeŋ .
Ajoc , mafa mâririhec ŋoŋe šârâ hâriŋ fua-ŋareocmu irec qanaŋ ki mamakuc enšepieŋ .

Go wiac šârâ hâriŋne mocwâc fua-gareocmu irec mi hâwicguzejec . Manakic , Sataŋ e eesâic fua-ŋareocte ŋoŋeraonec tucne kâpâcwâru ficko râec-jopaocmu . Eme ŋoŋerao fific guguriŋ šoaŋ gie bapa 10 fuaocmu . Goki ine miti paŋšâic jaha bajuku hâmotec juju sanaŋte eriduzi geroŋgupemu .
Anuture ŋic go wiac iŋucne geŋkezemec . Ehuc tiŋke biaŋ erâ mitihec â mamanasiŋhec â maŋjauŋhec â sasanaŋhec â buuruchec ecmurâ irec fotac qatariezemec .
Ŋoŋe mâreŋko wiac nâminširiŋkehuc mana aŋac embiŋ â okac dameŋ maickeha nâ areŋ embiŋ .
Erâ eri ŋeŋe sâko rârec rârec eri ŋeŋe gâcne 24 ŋerawec . Ŋeŋe irec faio ŋicqizec 24 ŋerambiŋ . Jaŋe ŋaqi qaŋqaŋ sasawa roŋembiŋ â eridu golzi-bakicne qizec-jeŋicko ŋerawec .

Ŋic ŋoŋere iŋuc jaha mupe ” ŋokac e tâpirine wahakacte ŋonâŋfâc-ŋeŋic wiac mana manahuc ejarenšepieŋ . Erâ juju sanaŋte biŋe mâmâc qajarekicnere sâsec-jopahuc junšepieŋ . Eme nunumu-ŋeŋiczi ququŋke tâmiric qâfâsâerâ fezejec .
Ŋokaczi qaqazu gie baocte me ŋic qâhuc-jopaocte mi manacnekopac , e mâc rumerâ juzejec .
Anutu e Ŋokâ-ticne Jesu Kristo , Wofuŋ-nâŋec hâcne , erao šuhuckeniŋte hefârec-ŋopaweczi mocmu mocmu-ticne mi fokac .
Âgofâc-nane , ŋoŋe niŋgiŋ tâmiric juniŋte hefârec-ŋopakicne , erâ niŋgiŋ tâmiric jujuzi âki eha sahacte dâŋ reŋkeniŋte mâcne , maŋjauŋko kiŋaŋ qaqac eniŋte irec hefârec-ŋopakicne .
Sâcmutâc dâŋ rambaŋko rârâec-nâpo izi juku fuŋne babataniŋ dameŋko rambaŋko râec-ŋopaocte wiac mana tarahuc mu bac enšepieŋ .
mitire kiŋaŋ gie fuŋne fuŋne fokac , gie rune ine Wofuŋ mocjaha ,

Á mimiŋnefâc-jeŋic jaŋe mitire fuŋqizecne jumbiŋ . Eme Kristozi ŋicsahac rohuc fuawec i jaŋere guruo fuawec . Wiac sasawa irec Wofuŋ jukac , Anutu hâcne , e mumuteŋheczi mumuteŋhec jurašihuc juzejec sanaŋ . Jâmbomac .
