Nâŋerao fific guguriŋ fuaekac , i ŋoŋerao bumâteŋ â bâbâpiaŋ fuaocte fua-nâreekac , â bâbâmiriŋ fua-nâreekac i wâc ŋoŋere erâ fua-nâreekac , ine bâbâmiriŋ izi ŋoŋerao fotâcnerâ dopec-ŋopahame fific guguriŋ nâŋerao fuaekac ijaha ŋoŋerao fuame irec šâic maŋuruc jaha mananiŋte .
Ŋoŋehec Kristorao râec-nâpo sanaŋkewec i Anutu eki hâcne .
Mume dâŋ harierâ šiŋuc fuawec : “ Anutuzi mušurekac i goki mi surec . ”
Mume Jesuzi dâŋ šiŋuc bâtikiecnewec : “ Moc e maŋjauŋ enareocmuzi dâŋnane mana rereŋ eocmu . Eme Mamac-nanezi e iŋuc jaha maŋjauŋ ecneocmu . Eme nâhe mâmâc erao fisirâ ŋeŋe juju enacmu .
Maŋjauŋte fuŋne šiŋuc fokac : Nâŋâc Anutu maŋjauŋ mi ecnembeŋ , ekizia nâŋâc maŋjauŋ enârehuc Ŋokâ-ticne soreme waharâ sâqocne-nâŋecte erâ kiwiric nâwoc rowec .
E jahacne tatamacko jukac iŋuc jaha wâc nâŋâc tatamacko junaŋmu , ine miriŋ babac sâcne enaŋmu , eme Ŋokâ-ticne Jesu Kristo ere soczi sâqocne-nâŋec šureme ɋaɋackenaŋmu .
Irec go kiŋaŋ qaqa-ticne mâcne , motec-ticne juekic . Erâ motec-ticne juhuc Anutu katucmâc-ticnere erâ merâfâc rune wâc juekic .
Ŋokâre ine šiŋuc mukicne : “ Anutu go ŋicwofuŋ ŋeŋege i ŋeŋe sanaŋ ŋerašihuc juocmu , â ŋicwofuŋ gunuge i bâbâtiŋ gunu biaŋ .
Eme Judaŋic jaŋe micnao rorâ šiŋuc âzâcnembiŋ : “ Gie biaŋne baekic irec mâcne , go ŋic jaha juekiczi Anutu âkehockehuc gahacnere Anutu muekic , irec qânâzi hecguzo muŋgopeneŋ . ”

Eme šoczi ŋic iŋucne šâfitac-jopame irec hosâcne ŋezume ŋezu fehuc foocmu sanaŋ . Irec ŋic qowi mimicne â hawari-ticne dieŋzi hecnembiŋ jaŋe mecne , â šâŋe qâreŋ-ticne bajumbiŋ jaŋe mâmâc šâiczi mi behec-jopame ŋeŋe mana tâmiric ŋafe furec šušuhuc jaha mana rahuc juniŋmu . ”
Wofuŋ e buafec-ticnere gie iŋucne munârewecte mi pârâweeŋgopeneŋ .
Irec nâŋâc hâbi-nâŋec rohuc šiŋuc munšepeneŋ : “ Wofuŋ e ŋeŋezic-nane , no mi hâwicnuzejec ; ŋic jaŋe wemo enareniŋmu ? ”
Irec wiac kosa nâocmuzi âgo-ticne nâ bâtâc eekac ere maname wawahane mi ezejec , â nâ bâtâc eocmuzi âgo-ticne wiac kosa nâekac ere maname mi sâqorezejec . E Anuture ŋic jaha wâc .
Anutu e babasanaŋ â bâbaafec runezi eŋareme Jesu Kristore sâko maŋ mamanasu mocjaha erâ junšepieŋ .

E taha bapa raŋɋane jaŋe iŋucne mâcne , e sindaŋ tâmiriczi wemocko šoaŋne šoaŋne qanaŋ e jahacne sindaŋte erâ taha bâzi rikerâ šâhec ŋic jaŋere rikezac , e jahacne maŋ sahac i taha bâzi-nâŋec mocjaha hâcne râeme tarawec .
Ŋic moc e nânâ mafa mâriri-ticne fohame âgo-ticne waha qaqane jume hone takirerâ bune bofackeocmu , ere muzo , maŋticnao Anuture maŋjauŋ mi fokac .
Erâ sifu mana afeckeeŋgopeneŋ . Ehuc sahachec mâreŋ jabao juju i beherâ mame sâko hae-nâŋecko Wofuŋhec juju irec aŋac-nâpoekac .
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane , no ŋazape mananiŋ , ŋoŋe mâreŋko jaba â ŋicmanac jueŋgopieŋzi sasec , maŋ qâqâtâc-ŋeŋicte râsi hâcne , i getâckenšepieŋ .
Ŋoŋe ŋic šeŋgoma sâsec-jopanšepieŋ , âgofâc-ŋeŋic maŋjauŋ ejarenšepieŋ , Anutu araŋ bacnenšepieŋ , ŋicwofuŋ sâsenšepieŋ .
Ehuc muwec , no âgofâc-nane Faraore meonec batarac-jopapemurâ Anutuzi gie bakac i mana taraniŋmu . Eme jaŋe ine mi mana tarambiŋ .
Ŋoŋe qâto jaŋere rucsoŋaŋ junšepieŋ , miti gie bapa bâbâsifucne , sahac hehetâc ŋic jaŋere rucsoŋaŋ hâcne junšepieŋ .
Jaŋe , Anuture fuŋne manaeŋgopeneŋ , miczi iŋuc muhapie eebapa-jeŋiczi ine mickeekac . Jaŋe ŋic mamakâcne â dâŋ qaqatara , â gie biaŋne moc bapanere sâc mâcne .
Jaŋe Anutu kiŋaŋ qacneniŋte šoɋac ehuc jueŋgopieŋ i honeekopaczi mukopac . Erâ i hatane kâuc bahuc eeŋgopieŋ .
Ehuc šârâ hâriŋ fuŋne fuŋne enâreme bâmiriŋ-nâpoekac . Eme Anutuzi bâmiriŋ-nâpoekac , bâbâmiriŋ izia nâŋe iŋuc jaha âgo gâcne šârâ hâriŋ fuŋne fuŋne maŋnao juhapie sâcne bâmiriŋ-jopanaŋmu .
Anutuzi mana-gareme sâckeocte šoɋachec juhuc giege bazemec , ehuc dâŋ fâri qizecne fâretiŋ jaha mujaŋgeŋkehuc jutec mimizi gieŋic gore faio mi fezejec .
Eme šâŋene Anutu me miti wiac mueŋgopieŋ i sasawa râsi ecnehuc qâhuckerâ ro waha âte ecne-fâreocmu . Erâ Anuture ufuŋko ferâ ŋehuc e jahacnere muocmu , “ No Anutu . ”
Mamac ŋoŋe naru motecfâc-ŋeŋic aaric bâfuanšipiŋte wiac kosa mi ejarenšepieŋ . Ŋoŋe mitio jaza bâtiŋ â uŋ sawaŋ ejarehuc soŋaŋ-jopahapie sokanšepieŋ .
Erâ wiac iŋucnezi mi bâdoc-nâpoocmu , aricne , Jesure uruc jauŋko âtesiŋnehuc sasanaŋ fekicne bâfuarâ domaeŋgopeneŋ .
Eme nâŋe mâreŋko rândiŋke qarâ fohuc dâŋ wiwira moc Judadâŋko šiŋuc manambeŋ : ` Saulo , Saulo , go wemocte nu jâpec enarehuc juekic ? Go šârâ hewâcnetec âkecgume šâic manacmu . Ž
Go fific guguriŋ faio qafec qawahac juekic , i manakopac . Erâ go mâririgehec . Á Judaŋic gâcnezi dâŋ gâgâpâcne gazaeŋgopieŋ , i wâc manakopac . Erâ jaŋe Judaŋic jâmbâŋ mâcne , jaŋe Sataŋte ŋicfâc .
sâqocnezi haŋ bame busâqoc manaocmu , â mitizi haŋ bame bubiaŋ manaocmu ”
Irec ŋoŋe maŋwânâŋ â râŋgeŋ bârâŋgeŋ hetararâ urucko juhuc maŋŋeŋicko mitidâŋ râekicne i âgo ecnenšepieŋ . Izi hâcne maŋ qâqâtâc-nâŋec bâpiaŋkeocte tâpiri focnekac .
No he sarac epo , Apolo e hofâ gie bawec , â Wofuŋzi ine jambuŋkeme fârine fuawec .
Iŋuc murâ rame râpefuŋnao aŋelo moczi warerâ šiŋuc wirawec : “ Babe hae sâko tâtiekac , tâtie-jâmbâŋkekac , hae irec rune mâreŋ sâc ŋicne sasecte waiŋ opâ momori gumec-jopahuc jumbiŋ hâcne . ”
Gie muŋareekopac i bapie honec-ŋopape âgofâc-nane eniŋmu .
Naru motecfâc-mae , wofuŋ jawane jaŋere rucgereŋ-ŋeŋic banšepieŋ .
Ŋic mukopac jaŋeraonec tucnezi kamierâ ficbiri juhuc ŋokac kosane , bahac fuŋne fuŋne bâfuambiŋ â saseczi ejareme ra qa ware qa eeŋgopieŋ , iŋucnezi jaŋere eniŋte mu bâdoc ejareeŋgopieŋ ”
Aricne , nâŋâc dâŋfâri paŋšâic bajupene maŋjauŋ-nâŋeczi fua sawec ehame qizec-nâŋec Kristo erao šuhucke sanaŋkenšepeneŋ .
Erâ Mâro e wamare muczi qâzuc-ŋoparâ dâtâc-ŋopawec , i qâtâcnenšipiŋte ruc babac ehuc junšepieŋ .
Mume Saulozi wiohuc muwec , “ Wofuŋ go mo ? ” Eme muwec , “ Nu jâpec enarehuc juekic Jesu no hâcne .
Maŋŋeŋic ba emasaŋ epie Kristo e tiri Wofuŋ juŋarezejec . Erâ maŋzi wiac worickehuc jueŋgopieŋ irec mu indiŋ eŋarepie afeckerâ fuŋne mutaniŋkenšepieŋ .
Domame Wofuŋzi šiŋuc âzâcnewec : ` Mâreŋ âtekomec i tiri mâreŋ , irec kikehuhuge heunuckec .
Fuŋnaonecteaŋ mitidâŋ mana warehuc jumbiŋ i hâcne maŋke junšepieŋ . Mitidâŋ i maŋke jupie Ŋokâ â Mamac jahe iŋuc jaha maŋŋopahuc junicmu .
No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazape mananiŋ : Moc e nore dâŋ bajuocmuzi hâmoc moc mi maicke-jâmbâŋkeocmu . ”
Eme no eri ŋeŋe kâcɋene qaŋqaŋ moc honepo . Fainao ŋewec ere maionec sambâŋ â mâreŋ wise tâmirepic .
Nânâ qowizi hobure biŋe â hobuzi nânâ qowire biŋe . Juku Anutuzi e â e mâmâc imac-jofame arictac enicmu . Sahaczi ine sasecte biŋe mâcne , i Wofuŋte biŋe , Wofuŋ e sahacte ru .
Eme ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha ŋaŋacnere manapie sâqocne hâmocnembiŋ ehuc Jesu Kristo ehec Anutu jucneŋgopieŋ ezejec .
Opoŋ , Anutu e Kristore gieŋicfâc-ticne nâŋe saoreŋ qahuc bataniŋ-nâpoekac , ehuc enâreme miti-ticnere âsu aŋac biaŋ bâiŋnepene ŋezurâ mâreŋ sâc raekac , irec mumuteŋ sâko ecnezo .
Dâŋ biŋe Jesuraonec kecšiŋuc manambeŋte ŋazaeŋgopeneŋ : Anutu e tatamac , dapâc i erao moc mi fohuŋgaŋkekac .
Mamaczi nareekac i jaŋe norao fisi-fâreniŋmu , â norao fisiocmu e mi bâsuepemu .
Qoqomâzi jauŋ babac eeŋgopieŋ i ŋoŋerao mi wahazejec .
Irec ere ŋesiŋko Anutu maickeeŋgopieŋ jaŋe sâcne bâbâpiaŋko râe basanaŋ ejareekac , e juju sanaŋ jukaczi hâcne dameŋ sâc roroŋ sasape ejareekac .

Mume jaŋe owa ruruckerâ mumbiŋ : “ E arictac eoc , e arictac eoc , maripoŋko feoc . ” Eme Pilatozi muwec : “ Hâc , eme ŋicwofuŋ-ŋeŋic mupe maripoŋko hâmoocte muŋgopieŋ me ? ” Mume taha bapa micne jaŋe dâŋ šiŋuc bâtikiecnembiŋ : “ Nâŋe ŋicwofuŋ-nâŋec moc aricne , Sisa mocjahazi junarekac . ”
Eme dameŋ ši iŋuc jaha Anutuzi aki anonoc-ticnere erâ ŋic tiwâne rowosâec-jopawec juŋgopieŋ .
Mâreŋne mâreŋne ŋic jaŋe ehec sasec eec eeŋgopieŋ â mâreŋ sâc ŋicwofuŋ jaŋe eraonec hâcne sasec-ticnere waiŋ opâ nârâ maŋsifuc ejareekac . ”
Ŋoŋe ââgo fârine junšepieŋ , erâ sâsâsec eniŋte sisiric efârenšepieŋ .
Anuture Mârozi de âsic ejareha jueŋgopieŋ jaŋe hâcne Anuture naru motecfâc .
E iŋuc ehuc domahame mâsi qâreŋ moc sambâŋkoa fuawec . Ine oâ sâko moc fowec , hawarine bâbâroŋ jâmbâŋ , qizecne 7 â šuŋene 10 , â qizec-ticne sâc ŋicwofuŋ du jaha ŋerawec .
Naru motecfâcne juŋgopeneŋzi Anuture huhure wâc rauckenaŋmu , Kristohec mâmâc wirec rauckenaŋmu . Ʒira mâreŋko ehec šârâ hâriŋ faio junaŋmuo ehec eri tatamac biaŋko mâmâc jaha junaŋmu .
Soŋaŋzi gie-jeŋic bapie biaŋkeme wiac bafehuc ehâmo-jarezo , ine miti mumu â qaqazu gie paŋšâic baeŋgopieŋ jaŋe hâcne iŋuc ejarezo .
Ŋic gâcne jaŋe ine fuŋne iŋuc sâcne mi mana-hâmoŋgopieŋ . Eme iŋucnezi nemu e wiac fârine muwarehuc juku maŋjeŋic ewecte tiwâ šepec e araŋ bacnehuc manabâcko nâpie maŋjeŋic hegâpâreekac .
Tieŋne moc norao foipiehuc fârinehec mi eme qâtâcne behec eocmu , â tieŋne moc fârinehec fome gie bacneme soka biaŋ eocte soŋaŋkeocmu .
Erâ wâc ŋicbomboŋ ejarehuc mâcne , lama micne bajarehuc miti hata bânie-jarenšepieŋ .
Âgofâc , ŋoŋe hâmokicne jaŋere kâuc bârâ , miti tâmiriczi maŋjeŋic šickeme ki mamakuc eeŋgopieŋ iŋuc enšipiŋte ŋazapene mananiŋ :
Eme Israe ŋic jaŋe mamanasiŋhec jumbiŋte Hâwec Bâbâroŋko tiŋko rara tinac rahuc fotâcnembiŋ . Aigita ŋic jaŋe i jaha ezo mupie hâweczi ɋâcjopawec .
Dameŋ ira hâcne Mose fuawec . Motec e Anutuzi honeme biaŋne jâmbâŋ ewec . Eme mamac-ticnere ficko soŋsoŋ barâ juhapie mosa jahec â moc ewec .
Taha bapa iŋucne e jahac ŋic dodocne jukacte ŋic mutucne â qâsoriekicne sâcne urucne ejareekac .
Ŋafe tarazo ekacte hae fureocte furic râekac . Irec dapâcte wiac hetararâ tatamackonec sându maro menâŋecko rašizejec .

Erâ ŋicbomboŋ ŋoŋe kiŋaŋ qaqafâc-ŋeŋic iŋuc jaha ehâmo-jarenšepieŋ , ehuc mu imac mi ejarenšepieŋ . Erâ šiŋuc mananšepieŋ : Kiŋaŋ qaqa â ŋicbomboŋ ine sambâŋko Wofuŋ wirec-ŋeŋic jukac , e ra rowec ware rowec mi focnekac .
Bubiaŋ eniŋmu jaŋe qâtec-joparâ bubiaŋ enšepieŋ , kioniŋmu jaŋe qâtec-joparâ kionšepieŋ .
Go maŋsanaŋ erâ maŋge mi bârisiehuc šocfiki bafeku seroŋ batec šoc šaza dameŋko Anuture mumutara dâŋ fârine fua taniŋkeme šâhâmocguocmu .
Eme ira juhapire Antiokia haeonec â Ikonioŋ haeonec Judaŋic fisirâ ŋic mu bâdoc ejarepie babafic erâ Paulo qânâzi hembiŋ . Erâ hâmokac muhuc hae râpeo fâre rambiŋ .
Jesu e dâŋ iŋuc murâ bu šašamaŋne fâuckezo eme mutaniŋkerâ šiŋuc jazawec : “ No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ mupe mananiŋ , ŋoŋeraonec moczi no doc bacnuocmu . ”
Ŋic mâmâc sasawa sâqocnere niŋgiŋko jueŋgopeneŋ , fuŋne-nâŋec iŋuc hâcne miti papiao mufuakicne . Eme irec hâcne Jesu Kristo manasiŋkehuc mitihec erâ biŋedâŋte fârine ronaŋmu , i sawa fokac .
Eme miti mumutaniŋ dameŋ-jekic tarame hârâckonec qowi mimicnezi wefurâ râsi ejacterâ jofame hâmonicmu .
Nâŋâc Kristore miti kâdoc babaju , ine fuŋkehuc manasiŋkembeŋ mamanasiŋ i paŋnea bajuku mao fisinaŋmuzi eŋgopeneŋ .
Kristozi maŋŋeŋicko jukacko sahac-ŋeŋiczi sâqocnere erâ hâmoc ruckekac , â maŋ qâqâtâc-ŋeŋiczi ine kiŋfâsâc bacŋopakicnere juju ruckekac .
Mimiŋnefâc-ŋeŋic jaŋe mo porofete mo akickembiŋ me ? Aricne , tiŋne rune fuaocte findaŋdâŋ mumbiŋ ŋic i jaŋe wâc mâmâc jopambiŋ . Juku e jahacne doc bahuc qaqa , ine ŋoŋe hâcne embiŋ .
mu kâroŋ , opâ momori me bec qowi âmbâŋ nânâ , erâ wiac gâcne . Wiac iŋucnere mârâc jaha ŋazapo erâ ši mocwâc ŋazape : Sâqocne i baniŋmuzi Anuture uucmaŋko mi rašiniŋmu .
Irec šoctamac foŋarehame maŋzi sakarehuc kikefuŋfâc-ticne enšepieŋ . ” Jesu e dâŋ iŋuc murâ ra soŋsoŋko juwec .
Eki gie runere mume rereŋ juwec , Mosezi Anuture ficko juwec irec sâc juwec hâcne .
E bâbâpiaŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristore erâ Tiri Mâro afecne mi qoŋgiŋke-nârewec .
Eme ŋic moc juwec šâŋene Josefe , aposolo jaŋe šâŋene moc Banaba mumbiŋ , nâŋâcne dâŋko Bâmiriŋmotec , e Lewire ɋâric , Kipiro nucko fuawec .
Wiac biaŋne i rorokac tâmiric enšepeneŋ , eme mi betaŋkenaŋmuo juku dameŋ-ticnao mâriri bâfuanaŋmu .
Á sâcmutâc dâŋzi nume hâmocnepo i Anutu jucnepemurâ epo .
Eme moczi gunusâc narehuc šiŋuc nazawec : “ Go fahare Anuture ufuŋ â alata sâc barâ maŋnao numuhuc jueŋgopieŋ jaŋe wosec-jopazemec .
Jaŋe hâcne ŋokacko mi sâqorehuc maŋɋaɋac jaha jumbiŋ ” jaŋe hâcne Lama jume ju ecneeŋgopieŋ ” jaŋe hâcne mâreŋŋic gâcne jaŋeraonec Anuture â Lamare qaqasune bâbâni rocjopakicne .
Ɋirikiŋ jaŋe ine becâsic hawari , momori jaŋe šikao raniŋte becâsic wiac bâmocke-jareeŋgopieŋ hawari iŋucne hâcne . Qizec-jeŋicko du golzi bakicne tinac ŋewec , šâŋe mai-jeŋic ŋic šâŋe mai tinac .
Ŋoŋe goroŋ-ŋopakicnere rambaŋ juŋgopieŋ , erâ juju izi sâqocnere tapa mi ezejec , rambaŋ juhuc Anuture kiŋaŋ qanšepieŋ .

Irec fârine hâcne ronaŋte gie amec fâfâuc baeŋgopeneŋ , ine mumusoriŋzi fai-nâŋecko feipieha Anutu jujune ere mamanacko juhuc eeŋgopeneŋ . E hâcne mâreŋ sâc ŋic jaŋere bâbâpiaŋ juekaczi mamana hec nâŋâcne ejâmbâŋkeekac .
Eme ŋic moc e Anuture Ŋokâ ro waha âte ecnehuc , šâšâficte soc ruarâ maŋfuru ewec i mana suahuc aki anonoc rune Mâro musoriŋkeocmu , e okacne mo iŋucne fisicneocmu muŋgopieŋ ?
Eme harierâ jazawec : “ Wama ŋoŋerao fozejec . Mamaczi no sorecnuwec iŋuc jaha noni ŋoŋe sorec-ŋopakopac . ”
Ŋic izi mu qâtimbucne , isoc qaisocne , sasec fuŋne fuŋnere hešâkiriŋkerâ jujune , pepecdâŋ mumune , ŋic moneŋ mafare mu bâmiriŋ eejarene , iŋuc hâcne jueŋgopieŋ .

Wiac iŋucne fuame mâreŋ sâc ŋicwofuŋ â ŋicbomboŋ , erâ momori micnefâc-jeŋic â mafa mâririhec â tâpirihec , ŋic fekicne â wahakicne mâmâc sasawa mâreŋ â qânâ hawecko soŋkerâ tiki â hârâc wâsic-jopahuc šiŋuc mumbiŋ :

Hâwic bâroŋ â miti qiqikiŋ â wâwânâŋhec â šika qaqa â sasecŋic â hafec qaŋgec ŋic â nemuɋâî babaju â siocdâŋ babaju sasawa , ŋic i jaŋere ŋeŋe lambe opâre riqiczi šoc šahuc foekac ira mukicne . Izi hâmoc namba tu . ”
Eme ši weniŋuc mâc jutec šoraocmu ? Go faharerâ Jesure šâŋe riwasecketec Miti Opâ rua-garepe sâqocnege tâmirezejec . '
Kanšaŋ-jeŋic šoricne , ŋokac qizec gere-jeŋicte sâc . Micjeŋic laioŋte mic iŋucne .
Wofuŋte kiŋaŋŋiczi mu hehefaric mi ezejec , e ŋic sasawa âgo ejarehuc miti micafec qazu-jarezejec , â pepecne ecnepie wiac aaricko mi ejarezejec ”
No sahac-nanezi wiwicko juekopac , maŋnanezi ine ŋoŋehec juhuc ŋoŋe Kristo manasiŋkehuc šišimic erâ sosoŋaŋko domapie honec-ŋoparâ bunane biaŋkekac .
Wofuŋ e ŋic tiŋne jaŋerao šâŋe fihuc mu wâwâsic-jeŋicte hazec râeekac , sâqocne bapa jaŋe ine Wofuŋzi hone qikiŋ ejareekac . ”
Âgofâc-nâŋec , Wofuŋte jorocfâc , ŋoŋe Mârozi baɋaɋac-ŋopame dâŋ fâri qizecnao qohotahuc biaŋkeniŋte Anutuzi mârâc jaha rowosâec-ŋopawec , irec daŋge hati âzâcnenaŋte maŋnâŋeczi jâiŋ-nâpoekac .
Irec sâqocne bapa e sâqocne bazo murâ bazejec , â maŋwânâŋheczi maŋwânâŋhec juzo murâ juzejec , â mitio juekaczi ine mitioa juzejec , â maŋfuru juekaczi maŋfuru jaha juzejec . ”
Mupie Petorozi šiŋuc jazawec : “ Ŋoŋe maŋŋeŋic bârisierâ Jesu Kristo šâŋene biŋeckehuc Miti Opâ ruapie sâqocne-ŋeŋic tâmirezejec , eme Anutuzi Tiri Mâro tahacke-ŋareocmu wâc .
Sâqocnere okac babazuc enšipiŋte sosoŋaŋ enšepieŋ . Ŋaŋackoaŋ â ŋic gâcne sasawa jaŋehec eehâmoc erâ erahuc junšepieŋ .
Á ŋic jaŋe iŋuc jaha ŋowe ŋonâŋ juju qikiŋnerâ maŋjeŋicko sasecte šocsâko šame jaŋe jaŋackoaŋ mamakâc fuŋmoc bâfuambiŋ . Erâ bâbâsifuc-jeŋicte okacne maŋ sahac sisipiric rombiŋ .
Á ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha šeri ehuc nohec bubiaŋ mananšepieŋ .
Irec ŋoŋe maŋŋeŋic bârisierâ juju raŋɋa-ŋeŋic râpeckepie kiŋŋeŋic tâmirezejec . Eme Wofuŋte maio nanaŋ šurec šurec juju irec dameŋ maicke-ŋarezejec .
Hae i moc mi ŋafeocmu , irec sac motâcne i šoaŋkore aaŋ sasawa doma-fâreocmu .
Moc e nore biuc â soc nâocmuzi juju sanaŋhec eocmu , eme noni dameŋ sâkoo bâɋârezokopac .
Eme Jesuzi šiŋuc âzâcnewec : “ Mâc muzac go nore dâŋ wemocko munšaŋ , nore dâŋ mumure faicnec tâpiri qikiŋne-ŋarekicnere mukomec hâcne . Irec gorao râecnukac ŋic ere kiŋzi gore jâurukac . ”
Irec mamanasiŋ bucticne , fârine eehâmo gie mi fuaocmuo , hâmo mâteŋ ekicne muzo .

Sâcmutâc dâŋ e maŋraŋɋa-nâŋeczi tâpirine bawahame nâŋâcnao gie bâipiewec . Irec Anutu e šiŋuc ehuc maŋraŋɋa sâqocne-ticnere tâpiri qame wahawec : Ŋokâ-ticne soreme sâqocne bapa nâŋâcne sahac hawari rorâ sâqocnere due bawec .
Me juju bapa tiŋnere erâ fific guguriŋ faio feniŋmu , ine manapie bubiaŋnehec ezejec . Ʒika hâhâwic eŋarepie ɋarac ɋarac mi qanšepieŋ â hâbi gogoroŋ mi enšepieŋ .
Mamac ŋoŋe naru motecfâc-ŋeŋic hâwic sahac enšipiŋte aaricko wiac mi ejarenšepieŋ .
Burecŋic i more muzo ? Jesu e Kristo aricne , ŋic moczi iŋuc mume ere burecŋic muzo . Mamac â Ŋokâ mic bacjofaocmu , ŋic ere muzo , e Kristore râsi qizec .
Irec moc e poroŋ â Wofuŋte waiŋ i enšaŋauc ecnehuc nâocmu , e Wofuŋ fâri â socticne nâsifuckeme kiŋnehec eocmu .
Ŋic maŋtac go mamanasiŋ eehâmo gie tâmiriczi wiac jawane ekac irec fuŋne ši manac .
Eme ira hâcne juhapie Judazi kiaraonec momori erâ taha bapa micne â farisaio ŋic jaŋeraonec motec rocjopame waha lambe â šika barâ rambiŋ .
Wofuŋzi ine mume sasanaŋ , irec hume keteŋ eŋarehuc sâqocne runere roroŋ sasapec eŋareocmu .
Eku behepie Farao otâ-ticnezi bâfuarâ motec bawec .
Aŋelo e iŋuc erâ alataonec šoc kine rorâ râqâc-ticne bâfuserâ mâreŋko hoŋkeme huwec . Hume ɋuŋ parandaŋ â bâbâric â homeŋ fuawec .
Eme iŋuc epore Judaŋic jaŋe taha ufuŋko rocnurâ qâhâmocnuzo embiŋ .
Ehuc mitidâŋ fârine râpeckerâ nemu binaŋko qohotaniŋmu .
Eme ŋoŋeraonec tucnezi ine mana maŋ mi eeŋgopieŋ . ” Jesu e miti-ticne qikiŋneniŋmu jaŋe mârâcko mana tarac-jopawec , â doc baocmu e mâmâc mana tarawec , irec dâŋ iŋuc jazawec .
Eme Jesuzi muwec , “ Poroŋ sicko âke uruckerâ râcnepe nâocmu ere hâcne mukopac . ” Iŋuc murâ poroŋ sicko âke uruckerâ Simoŋ ŋokâ-ticne Juda , Karioto haeonec , e râcneme nâwec .
O Timoteo , go merâfâc garekicne i soŋaŋkehuc bajuzemec . Erâ dâŋ jawane â fârimâc , ŋic gâcnezi bajuhuc šâŋene “ dâŋ qame hukicne ” mueŋgopieŋ , i qikiŋnezemec .

Eme ŋic bocjahazi miti manapie Judaŋic jaŋe mana sâqorerâ ŋic otec ɋeticne â râŋgeŋne henusuc-joparâ mu ojowa sâko erâ Jasoŋte ficko Paulo â Sila ŋepicko tumaŋne-fârembiŋ . Tumaŋne-fârerâ ŋicjahec hâcne rocjofarâ ŋichofao râec-jofazo mumbiŋ .

Ŋic moc e âgo-ticnezi sâqocne bame honeocmu , sâqocne hârâcte niŋgiŋ sanaŋ-ticnehec i mâcne , ine honerâ ere erâ numume Anutuzi juju hatao râeocmu , ine sâqocne hârâcte niŋgiŋ sanaŋ-ticnehec mi baniŋmu jaŋe iŋuc ejareocmu . Sâqocne hârâcte niŋgiŋ sanaŋ-ticnehec i fokac wâc . Iŋucnere nunumu gie baocte mi mukopac .
No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazape , moc e gie muŋarekicne ŋoŋe hezu hewâneŋ eŋareocmuzi gie rune no hezu hewâneŋ enareocmu , â moc e no enareocmuzi sorecnuwec e hezu hewâneŋ ecneocmu . ”
Nâŋâc uucmaŋ moc qiriŋmâc fofo sanaŋ rauckenaŋmu , irec Anutu mucne bacnenšepeneŋ , ehuc rumerâ araŋ bacnehuc , jahac maname biaŋkeekac irec sâcko kiŋaŋ qacnenšepeneŋ .

Ehame Judaŋic riuc bapa gâcne mâreŋ râreckehuc domambiŋ jaŋe penaroŋ erâ Wofuŋ Jesure šâŋezi riuc ripa-jeŋic eocte manasuhuc ŋic demoŋhec šiŋuc jazambiŋ : “ Jesu šâŋe biŋe-ticne Paulozi muekac ere micte wisezemec . ”
Paulo e ine Sila rowosâeme opâ ruac jaŋe Wofuŋte jauŋko ŋec-jofahuc mâzoc-jofapie rapic .
Gie bapene ŋoŋerao fârine fuawec , i sifucke-ŋarezacte soŋaŋ babac ehuc junšepieŋ . Eme juku fârine ŋemâcne ronšepieŋ .

Ŋic jahe hoere motâc henicte tâpiri jactekicne , irec mupire hoe mi hehe mâc fohame findaŋdâŋ muhuc junicmu . Erâ mupire opâzi soc eocte irec tâpiri fojacteocmu , erâ mâreŋko wiac micne momori fuaocte mupire sâc fuaocmu .
Anutuzi maŋsiocge honekacte tâpiri šizi moc mi hehuŋgaŋguhame mâc jâmbâŋ jucmu .
Nore biŋezi gore biŋe â gore biŋezi nore biŋe . Eme maŋjeŋicko huriri qâreŋ-nane fuawec fokac .
Jaŋe qâsoriekicne sasawa , šeŋgoma repirembiŋ ; moczi moc wiac biaŋne mi eekac , arictac jâmbâŋ .
Ŋoŋe hehefaricko â sahac mumuteŋko wiac mi enšepieŋ , moc e jahacne maŋ bawahahuc âgofâcne jaŋere maname fezejec .
Lambe ŋondeŋko moc domame honepo , e hawarine ŋic hawari tinac . Ŋaqi-ticne šoricne waha domawec , â amecnao umbika golzi bakicne fowec .
Hae ira wiac sâwechec mi foocmu . Anutu â Lama ere ŋeŋe hae ira hâcne fuame ŋicfâc-ticne jaŋe kiŋaŋ qacnehuc juniŋmu .
Wiac sasawa irec dameŋ bembeŋkekac . Irec ŋoŋe maŋsowa â pectâc juhuc nunumure afeckenšepieŋ .
Ira hurâ wokeo ferâ raku Antiokia haeo fisipic . Hae ira hâcne opâ ruac jaŋe Wofuŋte jauŋko râec-jofahuc gie mujactepie fuŋkerâ barapic .
Me ŋokac rozo murâ rotec wâc mi sâqoreocmu , â naru šeŋoŋ moczi ŋic rome wâc mi sâqoreocmu . Erâ iŋucnezi sahackopec wiacte hume serereŋ juniŋmu . No ine i tâmiric mac juniŋte enareha mukopac .

Ŋoŋe manaŋgopieŋ , nâŋâc râsi sahac biuchec jaŋehec šika qaqa mi eeŋgopeneŋ , aricne , ŋicbomboŋ sâko â momori sanaŋ , dameŋ ši dapâc fokac irec guriŋ bapa , demoŋ sâqocne sambâŋ rurumaŋko jueŋgopieŋ , jaŋe râsi enâreeŋgopieŋ .
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi maŋɋârâŋ basarâ Anutu numucnezejec . Eme e ŋic sasawa , dâŋ mi munârehuc , wiac maŋhumuc nâreekaczi bâfuacneocmu .
Mârore šoc mi hehâponšepieŋ .
Mitire qoruc boze hâcne kecšiŋuc bambiŋ : Maŋne moc maine , šâŋene Furufic mukicne , ira kendo kikenehec domawec erâ tebo ŋewec fainao poroŋ furu mukicne i fowec .

Irec go gazape manac : Go noraonec šuŋe kizukicne furine barâ boreŋhec ezemec , â ŋaqi qaŋqaŋ furine barâ hetec huŋ mimige sâockezejec , erâ šâŋere wokemaŋ furine barâ šâŋege ruacnerâ fiɋaɋackezemec .
No dâŋ i ŋoŋe kecšiŋuc mananiŋte qâreŋke-ŋarekopac : Anutu Ŋokâ-ticne manasiŋkeeŋgopieŋ ŋoŋe juju sanaŋ foŋarekac .
Moc e jahacnaonec manasurâ muocmu , e sahac mumuteŋte hata âteocmu , â moc e gie runere mumuteŋ fuaocte gie baocmu , ere ine sahac fefe tâmiric siocmâc jukac muzo .
Tâpiri šâkâŋ i nâŋerao mâcne , Anuturao fokac , irec fuŋne taniŋkeocte boreŋ šeŋaŋ-ticne kuši mâreŋzi bakicne nâŋerao duckekicne .

Âgofâc , kiŋŋeŋic ŋaŋac mi batarahuc Wofuŋ kimbeŋ-ticnere biŋe râepie fozejec . Dâŋ šiŋuc hâcne qâreŋkekicne fokac : “ Kiŋ babatara i nore gie , â okacne babazu i no nahac epemu , Wofuŋ e iŋuc mukac . ”
Mupie Jesuzi šiŋuc jazawec : “ No nahac sahac-nane bafepe mi sâckeocmu . Mamac-nane jukac , e Anutu-nâŋec mucneeŋgopieŋ , eki ine muafecnuekac .
Go nânâre erâ Anuture gie ima mi qazemec . Nânâ qowi i biaŋne sasawa , moc e ine , nârâ maŋbâiŋ gie bapemu , iŋuc manahuc sifu nâme sâqorecneocmu .
Jesure qâŋɋâŋ ruacnerâ qoruc qaŋqaŋzi râpâckepic . Judaŋic jaŋe qâŋɋâŋfâc-jeŋic iŋuc hâcne ejare jumbieŋ .
Ŋoŋe âgofâc-ŋeŋic kâpâcwâru ficko fepie jaŋere erâ buheric fua-ŋarewec , â moneŋ mafa ŋowac ropie ine mafa fârine fofone fonârekac muhuc manapie bubiaŋnehec ewec .
Eme Dawidi ɋâricfâc-ticne jaŋeraonec Israe ŋic nâŋâcne bâbâpiaŋ moc fuaocte biŋedâŋ mukicne i fârinehec eocte Anutuzi mume Jesu hâcne fuawec .
Irec dâŋqâreŋ fokac ine šiŋuc : “ Ʒâŋezi mi honekicne â hazeczi mi manakicne , â ŋicmaŋ moczi moc mi manasukicne , Anutuzi maŋjauŋ ecneeŋgopieŋ jaŋere biŋe bâmockewec i hâcne . ”

Eme Jesu hâmockonec bâɋârewec Anutu hâcne , ere Mârozi maŋŋeŋicko ŋeŋe juju ekacko , Kristo Jesu hâmockonec bâɋâreweczi maŋŋeŋicko Mâro-ticne jukac ere erâ sahac-ŋeŋic hâmocne i iŋuc jaha bâɋâreocmu .
Nâŋâc Anuture naru motecfâc jueŋgopeneŋ , dâŋ i Mârozi maŋnâŋecko musokame manaeŋgopeneŋ .
Anutu mu qâtimbuc ecnepie mâc foocmu , iŋuc moc mupie . I aricne jâmbâŋ , ŋic moc gie baocmu e irec fârine juku ijaha roocmu .

Irec go buuruc-ticnere mecne â fâro-ticnere mecne mi nikecguzejec . Fâro-ticnere fârine i miti râpeckembiŋ jaŋerao fuawec , â buuruc-ticnere fârine i gorao fuawec . Eme go erao qohotahuc jutec fârine i sâcne fogareocmu . Iŋuc mi etec ine go wâc hetâcne behec egareocmu .

Âgofâc-nane , ŋoŋe Wofuŋ fisiocte woŋec tatakic tâmiric junšepieŋ . Manaŋgopieŋ , gie rune moczi iŋuc jaha nânâ he sarac erâ fârine fua biaŋ eocte woŋec juekac , ehuc hoe šoaŋ sâckoa bacneme fua sokac eocte mamanac juekac .
Wofuŋ e Onesiforo ere wiacfâc maŋuruc qajarezejec . Mamac-jeŋiczi kâpâcwâru ŋic nore mi takickeha bubiaŋ hati qanarehuc juwec .
Naru motecfâc-nane , ŋoŋe Kristo maŋnao junšepieŋ . Eme juku fua tâcneme qacfiric domanšepeneŋ , ehuc fifisi-ticnao mimišu qâšušu ehuc wise ŋeŋe uruŋ mi enšepeneŋ .
Erâ ine šiŋuc mukopac : Ŋoŋe Mârore tâpirio siŋkerâ junšepieŋ , iŋuc ehuc maŋraŋɋare sasec gie mi baniŋmu .
Jesu Kristo e sâqocne bapa bâpiaŋ-nâpoocte mâreŋko wahawec , dâŋ i fârine jâmbâŋ â mâmâc sâko ro maŋ eenere sâc . Sâqocne bapa jaŋere micne no hâcne .
Mutarahuc mupe : Wofuŋtao roweckepie tâpiri sâko-ticnezi ŋoŋerao fotâcneme qaboc-ŋeŋichec junšepieŋ .
Irec hâcne moc e jahacnere maname sasanaŋ eekaczi dockezacte rumehuc juzejec .
Maŋfuru eere hatao juŋgopieŋ jaŋere taha mocjaha bahuc bâbâpiaŋ-jeŋicte gie batarawec .
Iŋuc mume Judaŋic jaŋe qânâ ameckerâ hezo embiŋ .
Eme ši moc mupe mananiŋ , Kristo e ŋicte kâcɋene , ŋic e ŋokacte kâcɋene , Anutu e Kristore kâcɋene .
Ŋic tucne jaŋe maric maŋgâpâc â qa imac ejarekicne , â tucne jaŋe me kike-jeŋic qarâ kâpâcwâru ficko râec-jopakicne .
Biŋe qanârekicne irec fârinezi juju-nâŋecte aŋga sanaŋne â tâtâcne tâmiric iŋucne ekac , erâ aŋga izi faic qoruc ââketâc irec râpenao râekicne fokac .
Gâcnezi dapâcte wiac jawane epie mi qâsuec-jopanšepieŋ , aricne . Ŋoŋe irec tapa qararuŋkehuc qatara-jarenšepieŋ .

Âgofâc-nane , ŋoŋe mumusâqoc mi enšepieŋ . Moc e âgo-ticne musâqorerâ okacne dâŋko râeocmu , e sâcmutâc dâŋ musâqorehuc hetâtieocmu . Go ine sâcmutâc dâŋ hetâtiecmuo rereŋŋic mi ehuc mumutara ŋic ecmu .
Sacmotâc 12 i kubu furi sâko 12 izi bakicne , motâc moc i kubi moczi bakicne , motâc moc i kubu moczi , iŋuc sasawa . Hae hata i goì ɋaɋacnezi bakicne , kiruŋ iŋucne fifimârâŋne .
Kristo e ine ŋokâzi fic rune jukac . Ficticne nâŋâc hâcne . Erâ i mâc mâcne , wiac biŋe qanârekicne irec mamanac paŋšâic â bubiaŋko juhapene taraocmu , ine ficticne eŋgopeneŋ muzo .
Jauŋ babac i sahaczi sawa mi enšepieŋ . Wiac sâqocnere mamakâc-ŋopazejec â wiac biaŋnao qohotanšepieŋ .

Eme dameŋ ijaha sambâŋko fepire izia homeŋ sâko bawec . Bame hae sâkoo fic gâcne , teŋkonec wâŋ irec sâc , herickehuc ŋic 7 tauseŋ jopame hâmombiŋ . Eme ɋâricne jumbiŋ jaŋe hâwic-jopame Anutu sambâŋ rune muteŋkembiŋ .
Ŋicwirec moczi ŋic mocjahare mâcne , bocjaha jaŋere qâqâhâc domaocmu . Anutu eki ine mocjaha .
Iŋuc eme Pilatozi šiŋuc âzâcnewec : “ Go dâŋ mi nazakomec me ? Noni mupe jucmu me mupe maripoŋko hâmocmu irec tâpiri râe-narekicne , i mi manakic me ? ”
Dâŋqâreŋ wosewec ine kecšiŋuc : “ Lama moc qa hezuc eniŋte baraeŋgopieŋ , me kanšaŋ bâbâtâc ŋic erao fâsâerâ foekac , iŋuc hâcne micticne moc mi aŋkewec .
Eme ŋicwofuŋte mupie Anutuzi Benjamiŋte ɋâricfâc jaŋeraonec Kisi ŋokâ-ticne Saulo âkendâŋne-jareme jara 40 micne bajarehuc juwec .
Ŋic bocjahazi râŋgeŋne â dâŋ racne mumu â eeatuc-jeŋichec juŋgopieŋ , Judaŋiczi opâ ruac jaŋerao wemo afecnezi iŋuc juŋgopieŋ .
Maŋnao qowi â homa wiac â wipe fuŋne fuŋne fowec .
Nâhâc maŋ mocjaha juekoperec , iŋuc jaha jaŋe maŋ mocjaha erâ junšepieŋ . Iŋuc juniŋte hâcne huriri qâreŋ naremeŋ ijaha jarepo .
Dâŋ fârine irec biri-ticne qazu-garepo ijaha bâjâpezemec , i Kristo Jesu manasiŋkehuc â maŋzi jauŋkehuc iŋuc ezemec .
Eme fic ira opâ pake 6 ŋewec . Judaŋic jaŋe me sahac-jeŋic gâbâ šure jumbieŋte fic sâc opâ pake iŋuc ŋerawec . Pake i piticne mâcne , kâcɋene sâko .
Ŋoŋe maŋŋeŋic ɋâreme pectâc juhuc sâqocne geŋkenšepieŋ . Ŋoŋeraonec gâcnezi Anuture kâuc baŋgopieŋ , i manarâ mimieniŋte mukopac .
Ehuc maŋhuhuŋ â buuruc â bumâteŋ juhuc maŋjauŋko dedec ââsic enšepieŋ .
Á gâcne jaŋere busâqoc manarâ rucŋeŋic bahuc bafic-jopanšepieŋ , ehuc qoruc-jeŋic sâqocnezi hegâpârekicne i wâc bâec banšepieŋ .
Nâŋâc manaŋgopeneŋ , Anutu maŋzi jauŋkeniŋmu jaŋe wiac izi me izi fua-jarehuc bâbâpiaŋ-jeŋic dopecke-fâreocmu , ine eki hefârec-jopaocte maname fowecte hefârec-jopawec jaŋe hâcne .
Miti mana rereŋ-ŋeŋicte biŋe i hae sâc rafârewec . Eme no irec ŋoŋere bubiaŋ manahuc kecšiŋuc eniŋte ŋazape : Wiac biaŋnere maŋafec junšepieŋ â wiac sâqocnere ine maŋ ŋeŋemâc enšepieŋ .
Ira hosâc ririke alata golzi bakicne ŋewec , erâ šâšâficte qorac tapa katapa golzi ɋorockekicne i ŋewec , erâ Aroŋte gunu ɋârerâ gitec hekicne i â qorac tapa mâmâc râekicne .
Eme mumuteŋ-nâŋec moc fokac me ? Aricne , mumuteŋ-nâŋec hetâtiekicne . Wemozi hetâtiewec ? Eehâmo giere hatazi me ? Aricne , mamanasiŋte hatazi .
Mamaczi no maŋnuekac â noni Mamac maŋkeekopac i mi mana šakiekic me ? Dâŋ ŋazaekopac i nahacne maŋte mi ŋazaekopac , Mamaczi nore maŋko juhuc gie-ticne baekac .
Eme ŋic guru sâko domambiŋ jaŋe aaric mana-jactehuc râsi šâŋe honec-jofapie kiazi ŋaqi-jekic heuc qâunuckerâ mume kâcbiŋzi jofambiŋ .
Eme ši sâcmutâc dâŋ ɋâricne ŋazape : Maŋjauŋ eec enšepieŋ , noni maŋjauŋ eŋare warehuc jupo iŋuc jaha ŋaŋackoaŋ maŋjauŋ eec enšepieŋ .
Nâŋe šiŋuc manaŋgopeneŋ : Mâreŋte ficboze-nâŋec raruŋkeme Anutuzi sambâŋko ficsanaŋ moc bâfua-nâreocmu , fic i mezi mi bakicne , mâc qiŋ sanaŋ qaŋqaŋ qakicne .
Jesu e hahaŋne bahuc dâŋ šiŋuc muwec : “ Moc e no manasiŋnuocmu , e no sawa mâcne , sorecnuwec e mâmâc manasiŋkeocmu .
Wofuŋ e dâŋ iŋuc muhuc âzâcneme Ananiazi šiŋuc muwec : “ Wofuŋ , ŋic ere mâretec mupie manaekopac , e fuŋfuŋfâcge Jerusalem haeo ba imac wemo afecne ejareekac .
Ŋic kecšiŋucne juniŋmu hâcne : Jaŋe jaŋacnere sawa manoniehuc juju , moneŋ sasec , ruruc bâbâcne , sahac mumuteŋ , musurecne , neŋgoc mamac dâŋ qaqatara , nâme nikecne , araŋ bapa tâmiric ,
Eme ši socticnere erâ kiŋfâsâc embeŋte okac dameŋko roroŋ sasapec sâcne enâre-jâmbâŋkeocmu .
No Wofuŋ Jesuhec juekopaczi šiŋuc mana sanaŋkekopac : Nânâ i me i nâhuc wâwânâŋhec eene mi fokac . Á moc e , wiac kosa nârâ wâwânâŋhec ezo , iŋuc muhuc sifu nâocmu , e ine jâmbomac wâwânâŋhec eocmu .
Go opâ ruac dâŋ i jaza qâmoc ecmu , ine Jesu Kristore kiŋaŋŋic dâŋ rereŋhec jucmu , ehuc mamanasiŋte dâŋ â mitire dâŋfuŋne fârine mana rereŋ ewaremeŋ izi maŋgere nâqiŋ eha jucmu .
